111112112211.content:

You absentmindedly rub her back as you think about your situation. You are lost in the woods, you have no food, it's Pokémon mating season, and your pants have been shredded. The small psychic type must have been tapping into your thoughts because when that crossed your mind she suddenly released her hold and floated over to the remains of your shorts. Her eyes glow and the fibers separated, before circling in the air. The threads slowly began to weave themselves together into a crude pair of shorts.

Your jaw drops at the amount of control it must have required to perform such a task. "Holy crap" Mew levitates the shorts over to you and drops them into your hands. "Mew!" She calls excitedly, proud of her work. You quickly slip into the shorts and find them to be extremely comfortable. "Wow they're great!"

Mew does a small backflip in midair at your praise. Her eyes shining with joy. She clasped herself back to your neck and snuggles again. "Mew"

"SSCCYYYY!" The mantis Pokémon slowly rose to her full height and brandished her scythes, screaming with rage. Her wings buzzed angrily and she hovered above the ground. Scyther rushed forward and swung a blade at Mew, too pissed off to realize that with how you were holding her, you would be injured as well.

Mews eyes flew open and a burst of energy sent the bug type rocketing back into a tree. She landed directly on one of her wings, and cried out in pain. She slumped to the ground whimpering. Mew seemed about to continue her attack so you grabbed her and pulled her to your chest. "Please stop" you whisper as you hug her. "She needs help and I wanna at least try"

Mew nodded and allowed you to approach the bug type. You crouched down beside her. "Hey" you said softly "scy" she choked out as she fought the pain. "I'm gonna take you somewhere that can help you okay?" "ther" assuming her vocalizations to be an affirmation, you gently slip one arm under her legs and another under her abdomen. She placed the flat of one scythe on your back to balance herself and gestured for you to continue.

You slowly lifted her from the ground and into a bridal style carry. "Which way to the center Mew?" The pink being slowly floated along, leading you through the forest.

11111211221121.content:
As we were walking through the forest, I noticed that Mew was breathing rather heavily. I thought nothing of it at first because she had just been in a fight so it would make sense that she was out of breath. However after about three minutes, her breathing so I turned to look at her and asked, "Mew? Are you alright?"

"M-mew," she chirped out weakly. This and the fact that she wouldn't look at me when she answered told me that she was lying.

"Are you sure I mean you are breathing rather... heavily?" I pressed but I noticed that Scyther was looking at me and breathing much in the same fashion. That's when it hit me: Mew was being affected by the mating season! "Are you being aroused by me?" I inquired of Mew.

At this Mew's eyes widened immediately and she turned around trilling, "Mew mew!"

"Turn around Mew," I ordered her. Mew turned around slowly and one look at her face confirmed my suspicions. Mew was blushing and looking at the ground ashamedly with tears in her eyes. I softly lay Scyther on the ground so as to not hurt her and cupped Mew's chin to make her look me in the eyes. "You shouldn't be ashamed of something you can't control. It's not your fault it's mating season. You are very powerful Mew but nobody as far as I know can control time. So stop being so sad," I consoled her. Mew seemed to digest what I said before blinking away her tears, smiling and nodding. I smiled back at her and hugged her.

Mew's and my hugging session was cut short when we heard Scyther moan, "S-scyt-ther." I turned to look at her and saw her holding her arms between her legs and a look of pain on her face. Immediately I crouched down to see what was wrong.

"Scyther what's wrong?" I asked forgetting that she couldn't answer. Scyther looked at me and moved her arms to the side so I could see her slit. It was gushing with her juices and throbbing. I looked up at Scyther's face and saw looks of pain and pleading. I realized that the only way the pain was going to go away would be if I were to mate with her. I felt a tapping on my shoulder so I turned around and saw Mew with a pained look on her face and her other paw between her legs. I took out my Pokedex pulled up the map of the region and saw I was only a sixteenth of a mile from the Poke Center. This left me with two options.

111131.content:
"I am a trainer" Yes i know, the most original phrase ever said.

I am talking to myself, literally, no no, i am not crazy, well maybe a little. I am what the others call a psychic, a human gifted with power over the sphere of the mind. I can Control..well, no not really, but i can Manipulate....well yes usually anyway, alright let's just say i can influence people and pokemon ok? Ok.

Now my actual number of powerhouse in my team reach the fantastical quota of: 0.
I am not lying, i simple don't have a pokemon yet, it's just that i am thinking over it alright, no, i am talking to myself, it's not alright, sight.

Better explain it, i am unable to control another being action, but i can influence how he/she will consider the matter at hand. For example i can persuade a bully to leave a child alone, reminding him the punishment for such action, making it more susceptible to further manipulation. Or i can influence a Pokemon behavior, make he/she believe that it's not hungry, or it's too risky to attack etc. However, trained pokemon and strong willed human can resist such manipulation, discard my little voice in their subconscious. You wouldn't believe however, on how many Rocket grunts this trick work, being them little more than moronic fools it's not surprising.

Now being the beautiful day that it is, i decided to get a stroll down the path, nothing dangerous really, simply a 5 km, rural touristic road, supposedly safe. As always, fate has a strange way of make you understand that Your concept worth shit. How was the famous phrase? Would like to make Arceus laugh? Tell him your plans.

While i am over thinking, a thing that tend to happen often to me, i heard a scream, human one to be sure. My curiosity (damn it all) get the better of me and, being the Grand Master of Stealth that i am, noisily move off the road towards the noise. Crouching behind a big bush, i get my curios head just over it to try to understand what the fu..

Shush Shush Something is there moving! What's that?

I keep my breath and a few moment later, a rare and powerful specimen of.....Bui! Bui! Da fac "IT'S THERE, GET HER!" Perhaps not.
Not a moment later, a rocket grunt appear from behind the trees, launching himself in a evident desperate attempt to catch the power..err, the pokemon. Now since when they are so desperate for a common Buizel? Something fishy here.

The scared, Buizel hide herself? just at the base of a tree not far from my position, however my attention get caught by a strange presence, something strong is near, a powerful psychic pokemon. Maybe it's that what they are after. So the Buizel it's just sport? Hunting her for sport! My anger cloud my vision, and i not rationalize that probably my assumption was incorrect, but i have stopped thinking rationally by now, it's time: Ass Whooping Mode, Activated!

I close my eyes and start focusing on the most moronic, empty headed fool that i can perceive, and sure enough 3 idiot appear on my whooper radar. It's Show Time!

Focusing again i start filling their empty buckets with doubts, doubts about their talents, doubts about their hunt, and of course doubts about their mothers as well. What? Work most of the time. Sure enough, i sense their empty head filled with doubts and idiocy, no i didn't add the idiocy, they have plenty already, and persuade them that this part of the forest it's not safe, that monster of tremendous strength hunt in this area, and that they will surely get themselves killed or worse, maimed trying if they pursue their attempt.

Of course, i may have forgotten to told them, that the biggest pokemon around is probably a strained Pachirisu, but they don't need to know all the details. After all, have you ever try to pet one? They are quite the nasty critter, shock anything they don't like, witch include nearly everything that moves, or don't. Ugh, don't remind me, little overcharged bastard.

As expected, after a very trough confabulation between themselves, they decide to run away, before the tremendous Pachirisus predator got them, they are carnivore after all.

I slowly release my focus, and open my eyes. As always a slight throbbing headache tell me that i need more endurance.

As soon as i get up the Buizel appear before me, she look at me with a knowing smile, than she transform. A blinding light obscure my vision, second later it's done, and the powerful Mew stood before me. That's my powerful pokemon, at least my instinct was right.

She levitate and come closer to me, than at arm leght she stop and start talking telepathically

"Hi Rukon! Thanks by the way, they where sooooo persistent" Her voice is sweet, melodic and playful, just as i have always expected to be.

I am....therefore i, no wrong film.

"Hi Mew, it's a...pleasure to meet you ahh yeah that one"

I hear a light, playful chuckle coming from her

"No need to be embarrassed, Rukon, i am thankful for the help!"

Doubts, no! Idea! Why? "Eh..forgive me Mew, but why didn't do it yourself'?"

Another light chuckle "Isn't it obvious Rukon? I couldn't. They had a device on them that can block pokemon metal waves, they would have just traced me, i know i have try it "

Just as i wanted to formulate more question

"Oh i really must go, don't worry Rukon, i will see you soon, there is a matter to discuss" And with this she wink her eye, then vanish.

Ok. Nice.

After having decided that remain here would be useless, and also pretty stupid, (Pachirisu are always in alert, damn rodent) i leave towards the road and my original destination. Peaceful day, my ass.

I didn't yet know, but that was the last normal day i would ever get.
111131.title: Thou mad?

1111311.content:
Have you ever thought that fate should take on an hobby? I do, you know, like gardening. No wait, better not give it ideas. I don't want to find myself surrounded by Bulbasaur or Bayleef, just because it's has nothing better do do.

After my peaceful (yeah, sure), touristic morning, i decided that home would have been a good place to relax for a while. How wrong i was. Knowing what happened later, would have i done the same thing? Yes, i would have, so i am either a fool, or just smitten. No don't say both.

I open the door of my unremarkable home just at the city limits, always liked the idea of having Pokemon around. When i decided that was time for me to live alone, i told my parents that they shouldn't have to worry about anything, nothing bad was gonna happen to me just because my backyard was so close to the forest edge. I was so serious when i have said that, man you should have heard me. Now i am still sure of my choice. I told you i was a little crazy no?

I started making the dishes, my laziness prevented me from doing it earlier, and i wasn't in the mood anyway. As often happen to me i was over thinking, even if this time, it's justified. I mean, i have just met one of the most famous legendary in existence, Mew, so you will excuse me i am a little absent minded at the moment. She told me that she has a matter to discuss with me. What could it be? An unremarkable trainer, with no pokemon, and limited psychic abilities need to help one of the greatest pokemon ever in a matter of critical importance? Well, at least i hope it's important, i hope she don't just want me to mow the lawn at her home or something, I know for sure that some trainer will give anything just for doing that. Some crazy trainer, eh?

My line of thought got interrupted by a strong noise, an explosion in the distance. If i remember correctly there is a meteorological research station not far from here. The hell happened?

Dropping the dishes i get out of my home, and looking at the direction of the station. As expected a thick, black smoke it's raising from there, did someone dislike the forecast for tomorrow? I know that there was supposed to be the Pachirisu cuteness contest but damn. Their trainers are nuts, just like their damn Pachirisu, useless rodent.

While i am tempted to go to see whats happened, and maybe enjoy the look of some Pachirisu getting is ass handed to him, i decide to let the authorities sort this out, they are paid for this after all, why should trainers always solve their problem? Especially a pokeless one. Lazy tramps.

I return inside, and forget about the dishes completely, instead i turn on the TV and watch the news. Maybe they know something already about the accident. As i was about to seat, a presence, just like before let himself, herself? knew to me. Mew.

I throw the remote on the couch and ran out in my backyard. Sure enough, as soon as i got there, in a flash the legendary appear before me, but something else is with her. It's has a humanoid shape, with purple and light gray skin. Wait, i recognize it! On Pokemon weakly (i know their name are lazy as their articles), the more powerful pokemon section. Mewtwo! Oh shit!

I don't have the time to scare myself out that Mew talk to me

"Rukon, i need you help!" I am stunned for a moment, but then i am not gonna pass for the campus fool and stay there frozen.

"Coming!" I get to her, so close i can smell her. I can recognize the smell of lilacs and colbur berry.

I help her bringing Mewtwo inside, it's seems unconscious for the moment. Still i am weary of it's presence, i know that a powerful pokemon like this one doesn't really lose consciousness, they just ignore their surroundings for a while. Maybe is in shock? I feel it trembling.

I try to lift it up, but damn it's heavy, before i can make a fool of myself, Mew help me lowering it's weight using her powers. With her help i easily lift Mewtwo bridal style, and bring it in.

I deposit it on the couch, then turn to speak to Mew.

"The research station, it was you?"

Without hesitation she answer "Yes, but it wasn't a research station, it's was a Team Rocket facility, they where trying to replicate Mewtwo, and for what you can see, they succeeded."

Wha! What?! Really! Oh man!

"They was doing what?! Sick bastard!"

"Yes they are definitely sick, but to the matter at hand." She then levitate near me and get over the Mewtwo

"I have saved her just in time, they was trying to implant her with something. A device capable of manipulating pokemon perception, i believe that they intended to use it for controlling her." Her?

"Yes, Her. I can speculate that they thought it would be easier to control a female, knowing that their original, a male was far too aggressive."

"Mew, i mean no disrespect, but won't Team Rockets start searching for her?"

A light giggle "Don't worry, i have not exposed you to a direct risk, i uhh, "convinced them" that their subject was killed during the assault, they will know the truth but it will take time."

I nod to her "So you want me to hide her?"

She smile "Correct, for a brief period of time, until i can bring her to the council. I trust you Rukon, i know you are a good person, don't underestimate yourself" I have the trust of Mew?! But i did nothing

The giggle yet again "You helped me where others would have ignored or even taken advantage of my predicament earlier, beside i was observing you for while" Observing me?

"Of course, you are.." Mew stop, she turns and she seems trying to listen to a distant voice. Her fluffy tail delicately strike me on the nose, and i can smell her again. She is so..

She turn around to face again, and ignoring what just happened she say "I must go, keep her safe, don't worry just let her rest, i will explain everything to you as soon a possible" Don't even have the time to say bye, that she vanish once again.

Ok my day is gradually improving, first Team Rocket and Mew, now Mewtwo is taking a nap on my couch, then what? What have you in store for me fate, do you have a bone to pick with me or something.

Sighing, i take my leave from the couch and let Mewtwo sleep, she look like she need it badly anyway, and return to making dishes. I will never complain about boring day from now on.

Darkness cloud my vison, sleep at last
11113111.content:
Dishes how i hate you so. Would be possible to make auto-washable dishes? Maybe, i would buy them for sure. A dishwasher? Well, perhaps but they don't convince me much, last time i got to go to the exhibition of technology, new pokeball was presented, and among the other things a new device capable of storing 10 pokemon inside, without the need of balls. Impressive no? Then i got to the section dedicated to improving home living and i saw a dishwasher in action, i still have nightmare of it sometimes. How in the hell the water jets was able to strip and then throw the demonstrator trough the wall, maybe having taken a Milotic as a base design was not a good idea.

Seriously it's utterly ridiculous, we can store and compress living matter and then restore it fully, we can transport limited quantity of mass at enormous distance without problem, but we can't make a functional dishwater?

Nonetheless patience and discipline, the basic of most psychic discipline, easier said than done.

Suddenly i feel a pressure at the base of my skull, it's not painful it's just like something it's try to drill straight trough it. Without even thinking i put up a mental barrier, a conditioned reflex when a psychic is involved. I have never felt a power such as this, it's wild, savage, simply try to resisting it drain me.

I feel the psychic field increase in strength, then suddenly it stop, i recognize the source or at least the origin of it, the sitting room, Mewtwo must have waked up. Shit Mew! Where are you....

More than a little scared i focus my will on remaining calm, i succeed, and now i can walk without stumble in my own legs. I cautiously move thought the kitchen and into the sitting room, where i found Mewtwo seemingly asleep. I know that it's just an appearance, and as expected she open her eyes.

I can't describe what i feel, terror, sadness, anger, all this emotion pass trough me like a river, i don't know if i can resist much longer. A few moment later the flow of emotions suddenly stop, and i found my hands gripping my still throbbing head, opening my eyes i see Mewtwo watching me intently. A strong prodding enter my mind and i lose my balance, only to find a strong but delicate kinetic field holding me afloat; Mewtwo has decided to study me, to know me. Being a person that liked pokemon, and never even thought of abusing them, i don't think that she will kill me painfully, at least. I remain afloat with this presence in my head, shifting, prodding at memory and emotion with complete disregard of privacy or care as i am disoriented and my sensory feedback it's all screwed, i close my eyes and wait.

11113111211112122.content:
I was caught up in my thoughts when I smacked into something large and made of metal…I looked up to see a damn tank sitting there hidden by the foliage.
“What the hell is this thing doing here!?” I shouted in surprise.
“Funny…I was going to ask you the same thing,” a voice behind me hissed as I felt a knife press into my neck, “Order your pokemon to stand down…Now!”
“What’s to stop them from rending you to pieces in the blink of an eye?” I asked in defiance.
“You may kill me…but who says I’m alone,” he whispered into my ear, “You and your imitators will never escape my lord.”
“Imitators?” I asked confused…he used the word like an insult but I still remembered to order Mewtwo to stand down.
“Yes…your ilk attempted to reproduce my people’s traits but all you succeeded in doing was create a poor imitation,” he hissed in my ear as he pushed me forwards, “You may have gained strength but it is nowhere near as powerful as ours.”
I looked up to see a Zoroark sitting in a nearby tree gazing at us a small smile on his muzzle…he then turned his attention towards Mewtwo and he began to snicker before jumping down to land in front of her.
“So you’re the ones who were mucking around the forest,” he snickered in perfect English much to my surprise, “A pokemon who bonds with a Warrior we gain the ability to speak…unfortunately a filthy imitation does not possess this power nor any of the powers associated with Warriors.”
“A Warrior?” I inquired confused…I’d never heard of these people actually existing…there were hundreds if not thousands of stories of these peoples heroics and adventures.
“I know your shocked,” the man with the knife chuckled, “We haven’t left our homeland in two hundred years and as such only stories of us remain.”
As he pushed me forwards again I saw an entire encampment with soldiers preparing for battle…many of them were wearing gray light body armor and carrying assault rifles but a few were wearing white full body mechanized combat suits and were prepping gatling guns, laser rifles, and infantry based artillery…for every four people in the clearing there were three pokemon wandering around and at the center was a man in ornate black armor with archaic yellow designs that hide the armors futuristic capabilities…mounted on his arm was a sword connected to a shield that had two assault laser guns mounted inside it on either side of a grenade launcher. I was quickly brought before him as he stood there and a slight look of disgust crossed his face.
“An imitator…what brings you to my battlefield?” he inquired.
“Why should I tell you!?” I barked only to be slugged in the gut by the and that had been holding the knife…I saw now that he was a modern day ninja.
“Watch what you say to the emperor boy!” He hissed angrily.
“That was unnecessary Yoshi,” the emperor growled, “Now let us start off formerly…I’m Emperor Masakage the third…this is my comrade Yoshi…we are Warriors of the nation of Ransei…and what is your name imitator?”
“I’m Rukou,” I answered unsure of this man…his aura of power was undeniable, “What are you doing here.”
“I’m guessing the same thing as you,” Masakage answered, “We’re here at the behest of your government to eradicate your people’s problem…for a very large fee of course.”
“What are you just mercenaries for hire now?” I inquired of these people.
“Yes and no,” he answered, “they’ve promised us 10,000,000 poke and an ancient artifact of my people.”
He turned and walked away leaving e standing there as his soldiers moved with him towards the edge of the woods…I quickly followed them to see a bunker fortified with barbed wire barricades, trenches and soldiers patrolled it.
“Clear us a path,” Masakage stated into his gauntlet…and seconds later artillery shells rained down upon the area slaughtering those not in the bunker or trenches and leaving the area above ground barren. But quickly more Rocket soldiers emerged but where now engaged by the Ransei soldiers in gray light body armor and were unable to advance far. The Rocket soldiers tried to swing around to the right only to be caught in an ambush by soldiers wearing red power armor and wielding flamethrowers and laser rifles. Fighting alongside them were dozens of fire based pokemon who were burning down the Rocket forces with extreme prejudice.
“Looks like the Ignis battalion has arrived to the fight,” Yoshi stated readying his knives as Masakage moved to the front of the Soldiers in white power armor.
“Soldiers of the supreme heaven’s law…I bring before you an offering of fools for you to cleanse,” Masakage shouted turning to face the battlefield, “Now soldiers of Aurora go to battle and win glory for the empire!”
The soldiers let out a cheer and charged forwards into the fray as tanks ripped through the trees and barreled down the battlefield their coaxial machineguns opened fire mowing down the opposing Rocket forces…I realized that this attack was highly planned but…the Ransei army was famous for being able to eradicate an enemy quickly but it seemed that their forward momentum had stalled…I was wondering why…and why would their emperor put himself in such danger.
“He is using himself as bait,” Mewtwo stated over our link, “He’s hoping to draw out something…he probably knows more than we do…I recommend joining the battle.”
I was shocked…how could I hope to not get in the way of these soldiers…maybe it would be better to hang back and watch…

Just when i feel my evil laugh coming out, ready to strike fear in the hearth of any poor fools that even think trying to stop me, the balls of my chosen victims open, unexpectedly releasing Pal and Dial. All in all, i should have know that pokeballs can't really contain a legendary unless he/she are willing, they are just too strong, or at least some of them.

Dialga "Damn that those things are cramped, can't they add some more space, i can barely move in there!"
Palkia "Sis, they just can't, their knowledge of space compression is still in the early development, they will take years for perfecting it"
Dialga "What are you saying, i saw those expansed pokeball sold at the....mart, yes they call it that way, and there are all comfort inside those" Dialga make a disgruntled expression
Palkia make a confused expression "Dear sis, what in tartarus are you talking about?"
Dialga "What you mean what i am...the expansed balls the one with three striped......oh" Her expression become confused, than "Oh, i must have confused this with the other stream, sorry" Wat?

I don't even bother asking, i probably don't want to know "Have you two done?" They look at me with a winning smile, the one you get when you found out that the above mentioned goldmine is deeper than expected. I am not sure if i should be scared or happy, i am both tough, i am happy. It's this i am feeling their happiness? Could very well be.

"So, hungry? I have prepared out dinner and" i can barely contain myself "i hope you like......some nutritious food" Well thats true enough

They both look at me with the same, now creepy smile, their tone become dripping with lust as well
Dialga "Of course that we are angry, an hunger so deep that only a Very Long dinner could satisfy"
Palkia "A Long and Hard dinner" Ok, everything is alright, i just need to calm down, yes breath in, breath out, breath in.....
Dialga "Of course no dinner is complete without some dessert"
Palkia "Yes, some creamy dessert, our favorite" Ok, everything is not alright, breath in, breath out....

Palkia with the same tone "But maybe, our Master wish for some eye candy first, after all, you eat with your eyes as well" She said, walking slowly toward me like a predator ready to strike
Dialga "Of course sis, Master deserve some relax, after all that we had put him trough" She start to walk toward me as well.

I think that i can remove the word relax from my dictionary, i don't think i will use it anymore anyway. I stay still, provoking dangerous predator is not that wisest thing you could do, then not more than a meter from me, Pakia turn around, giving me an unrestricted view of her already aroused sex, Dialga just do the same, i am shocked, can't i even have dinner now?

I am aroused i admit, but not now. "No, stop it we will dinner like a family now, later, we'll see." I then walk away, with uncomfortable tightness in my underwear and an awakened lust, i should be able to calm tough, yes i will. I feel that Plakia and Dialga are not unhappy as i thought they would be, instead they are even more excited, i must bring some ice cold water with me from now on, being both dragon type maybe.....

Both of them "Of course, Master, later" Shit, can't even leave them to the daycare or something, they would probably just tear it down, and find me anyway, beside i don't want to leave them, nor now, nor ever. The bound again, could i really love them one day? Maybe i already do.

11133111111111.content:
The thought of love leave me confused for a few moments, i shake my head, like in doing so all the unwanted memories could leave me alone, returning in the blackness that is my consciousness. Focusing on the present, my giddiness return as i think once more to the plan now ready for deployment, i will teach them to not take me for a fool, i am Not a plaything, I Am their Trainer and Mate and.....mate, ok, alright, perfect...THE FUCK THEY DID TO ME?!

I hide my anger, burying it with all the unwanted memories recently resurfaced, after all i admit that i have always wanted them, although i am pretty sure that my plan didn't include the....bounding part. Damn, i am behaving like a child....maybe i am, compared those those two at least.

Dialga: "Sooo Master, when dessert will be served? I am eager to get a taste.."
Palkia "Sis, your impatience is annoying, just like your whining, patience, first dinner then dessert..."

They are worse than a fifty something woman asking for a ride from a sixteen, depending on the situation...very creepy, or very... "Nine! Ni nine nine!" Risa is pissed, i can tell, i think that she didn't like their constant teasing, or maybe she is just jealous, she is not what you would call a sharing type individual

Dialga: "Later? How amusing sis" Funny how the ^essence of time^ is the most impatient of the two, or maybe she just want to play fast forward on the dvd she call stream, that would imply that she already knew the end tough, i...don't think that is really possible..to know all the details about the future i mean...maybe i should test it, or just ask...

"Dialga, it's possible to know the future, every detail i mean" she still bear that mischievous/winning smile: "No, not really. Major Events can be foretold, perceived or as you human...eheh well not anymore..." here we go again, she continue "Still they can be expected, some at least, but the details...no not really. Some are literally written in stone and would require a ^Big Hammer^ to change them, of course that would provoke all kind of mishap in that stream and maybe others as well, after all a Big Hammer is anything but delicate"

She pause for a few moments, probably letting me absorb the information, then: "Minor events are not...how to call it....planned, they happen as they go, the being living it can plan them and change them as his ability and equipment permit, but some degree on uncertainty always linger....sort of random, it's however possible to know the outcome of an even while is ^running^, perceiving the change that it will bring"

As strange as it seems, i think i understand what she is saying, she continue: "For example a game of dice may has been planned for years, or century before the player are even born...but the outcome in most case is not, not really anyway only the more probable or the more acting at the moment, it's hard to describe" Ok maybe another time, but know the moment?

"So i can..feel if i am gonna win or not?" Dialga: "Yes it's possible, the event may even be influenced by you belief as well" If that's is true than i....somehow placed myself in this condition? I have willingly changed my fate to...it's too much for now

"Alright, so, hungry?" Palkia: "Definitely" Dialga: "I would prefer to skip to dessert...but okay, for now...." She will drive me mad, still the plan, hihihi

"Please, do take a seat around the fire, dinner is ready...you bet it is" Pal and Dia put themselves comfortable near the can of chow, while I and Risa grab a dish of chilli, our esteemed guest look at us with curiosity as asking: and us? I then point at the can of chow, observing with interest at their reaction......yes priceless. Their disdain for the thing is topped only by Dialga reaction, she extract her claw, a shimmering curved...i don't know some sort of ^living blade^, and slash both thing in two. Wow her Metal Claw are scary, note to self: don't piss them off.

Dialga then look at me with a serious/bothered expression: "Really? Are you serious? You believe that we are Nothing More Than COMMON POKEMON!? SOMETHING FOR YOU TO PLAY WITH?!" Her voice is strong, enough to to top down the tent and scaring any wildlife was in the vicinity, including my now flat hair, everything go silent..

Palkia: "Sis, you have no sense of humor whatsoever, don't have you noticed that Risa was smiling? It's was a joke, although a bad one...." She said looking at me, damn prickly much?

It's better to clear this mess, i just hope that the enormous boulder not far from here will remain where it is "Dialga, seriously i just have thought that you would have needed a good mix of food for powering yourself" They look at me strangely "Aren't you both capable of manipulating Time and Space?" They nod "Don't you require quite the amount of energy for doing so?" They hesitate, but nod again "The food you just...annihilated, was rich in protein, fiber, carbohydrates and anything you may ever need for a fast and complete recovery"

They look dubious "It's quite simple really, pokemon body require a lot of energy for powering their attacks, so we developed a specific diet so that they could use their ability at their maximum potential, you are what you eat, ever heard of it?" Their face show realization now

Dialga: "Sooo, you wanted to..make us recover faster?"

Ehhhh..nope? "Of course, i realize that the chow doesn't exactly taste as good as a full fledged dinner..but it's a much better diet than...chilli"

Dialga: "..Sorry...we...all those years would be master has come trying to capture us....and for a moment.....sorry" She is ashamed

Palkia with an inquisitive look: "Why Risa is eating chilli then?" Easy enough "Because she has barely fought at all, you two ^surrendered^ nearly immediately, or did you have already forgot?" I continue "How much strength the bond took from you two?"

They both look at each other, then Both: "Some" Some uh? Aren't we prideful..."You both dropped unconscious!' Both: "Not really..".....No, i Will Not ask That

I grab two dishes, filled with our real dinner "Want some?" They both nod, and i place it at their feet and we all start eating together.

Silence. Dinner at his best.

That was close.....

111331111111111.content:
Dinner is consumed with the utmost silence, not even the wildlife are daring to emit and eep, fearful that the deity of time and space would crush them just by the very thought...Pal and Dial doesn't seems to be that way but...i suppose better safe then sorry.

I had enough of this silence, we are here to talk and relax...even if our ideas of relaxing seems to differ, their one being more..active then mine, i have no intention to pass the night enclosed like in a nunnery. "So..eh, Palkia, how do this bind work exactly?"

Plakia look at at me, forgetting the food: "Well, in truth..i..we don't really know" .......Are you ser

Dialga interrupt my thoughts, now looking at me with her signature smile: "Only Arceus know every detail i am afraid, but we can tell you much, or we could straighten our bound and you can see it for yourself" Damn it Dia, does she have anything but sex in her mind? This is getting awkward, but perhaps i can use this in my favor.

I see that Plakia is starting to berate her sister, and i decide to intervene: "Dialga, try to be a serious deity for at least five" i show her my hand with five fingers "minutes ok? Just five, and...i am gonna regret this, IF you answer my question seriously and Tell me everything you can, i may..consider the dessert part"

I lower my hand, as Dialga smile become big enough to encompass all her muzzle, not unlike certain anime supervillain: "Reeeallly now" purr..SHE CAN PURR?! Oh yes she can, done this before, if she didn't have all that metal around her body and in the dark, you could exchange her for a big cat....no not really

Dialga continue with a seductive tone, while Palkia look at me bemused "Of what kind of dessert we are talking, exactly?" I see that she don't like to take chances, at least not with her ^prize^

"Well, depending on the answer.." Dialga start to slowly advancing towards me, i notice the she is trying to provoke a reaction by moving her back in rhythm with her walk, i don't think that she realize how my mate could be imposing by doing so, after all she is easily bigger then me ..i have said mate again..fuck

Dia reach me and gently push me down with her front right paw, she then place both forelegs at my side and lower her head to my face, despite the feeling of lust and affection coming from her i am still pretty scared i admit. Her muzzle come closer, and the metal surrounding it, liquefy, moving to other parts of her well toned body.

Question about her ability to control metal, her own or others as well, surge from my mind, but her hot breath forcefully bring me back to the present.

Dialga place her mouth close to mine and with a low, nearly purring tone say: "Depends..my love? From what? I you don't like my answer why don't you try to get them by force, hmm. Maybe forcing me to bend down for you and..."

Risa intervene by trying to showing off Dial: "NINE! NI NI! NI NINETALES!" Dialga barely move and look at Risa with an amused grin, and as soon as she try to lower her muzzle to me again, a pink/violet energy grab Dial pushing her off me

Palkia with an angry tone: "Sister! What in tartarus are you doing to our mate?!" Dialga get up, the metal on her muzzle reform soundlessly, answering with a bored tone: "I am just trying to get Our mate in the mood, that's all"

Palikia now pissed: "IN THE MOOD!? You have SCARED the living spirit out of him, look at his face, you idiotic sister of mine, now we can forget tonight dessert"

I am still a little shocked, still laying down, i know that Dialga didn't want to scare me but..she isn't exactly an Evee you know..

"Nine, nine nine" i feel Risa muzzle caress my cheeks, her tongue gently lick my face help me relax a little, while her concerned look persist

Palika: "Sister do you realize that you Cannot be so aggressive with our mate? He is not Rayquaza, you can't just push him around and expect who know what"
Dialga: "Rayquaza? That wimp? He had the audacity to ask me, Me, to mate with him. You are right sister i should have not pushed him around, i should have crushed him where he stood."

Palkia with an exasperated tone: "We are Not talking about that overgrown Seviper, sister, we are talking about Our lover, the same that you nearly forced.." She is interrupted by Dia screaming: "Forced?! I don't Need to force Our mate to do anything, he Loves us sister, why should he refuse my offering? I just wanted a different, more direct approach, but if You think that that was too aggressive i just present and wait for him to take me then"

Dialga start to come towards me again, but Risa would have none of it: "NINE! Ninetales Nine!"

Dialga: "Ha! Like you could stop me, just get out while i.." Booooom

A loud explosion deafen me for a few seconds, a column of smoke cover the area where Dia stood. I hear an elaborate breathing and turning, i notice that Palkia is the source, she doesn't seems tired, just pissed

Palika: "Sister i have just about enough of you, desist, this is not how it should and must be" A deep menacing growl can be heard coming from the still fog of smoke, and sure enough Dialga jump out and assume a fighting position, ready for a battling her sister once again, after not so much time.

Here, i forcefully snap out of my stupor, and decide that this is enough. With a sudden adrenaline rush, i push myself to my feet, and walk determined between my bounded to stop this idiocy before it even start.

"Enough!" They both stop and look at me with a surprised expression "I don't want to have Anything to do with the whiny, pestering children that you two evidently are! I will Not allow your stupidity!" I point at them both, they lower their eyes to the ground, ashamed "To cause another incident, you know at what i am referring to..."

I pause, recovering my breath: "I don't care who started what or how..." I lower my hands "I do Not, want to see any of you two at least until tomorrow, did i have make myself clear?"

Both raise their head, and looking at me they start to mumble something, but i don't care: "No! I will not hear your whines or any of your excuses, now go, both of you" They seems to want to say something, but i will not permit it: "NOW!"

The both look at the ground again, and without another word, vanish, maybe in their respective dimension..i don't know, i don't care now.

I slowly feeling myself chilling out, while i walk towards the downed tent. I silently rebuild the small structure, and promptly go in, Risa following closely.

I lay down on the bedroll, uncaring about getting inside. Risa immediately try to lay on my chest, partially succeeding. I gently grab the her soft fur on her head and stroke it,
letting her warmth lulling me to unconsciousness. I am tired now, mentally more then physically, and with the last glimpse of anger leaving me, i slowly fall in an uneasy asleep.

11133222111.content:
Every summer, you and your dad would head up to a private mountain home your old man owns for vacation and lodge there. It was a nice place. Pretty cozy, nice cool weather at night and provides a great view of the mountain side. There's a small town nearby where young rookie pokemon trainers hang out before making their dangerous trek up the mountain, so you werent very far away from civilization either.
Although you see plenty of folks socializing with one another as they make their way into the caves. Most of them are just the rookie trainers talking about how theyre gonna catch THIS pokemon or conquer THIS gym leader or face off against THOSE outlaws of Team Flare or Team Plasma or Team Socket or Team Snuggle or Team Wyattearp or whatever... and a few hikers you once overheard talking to each other about finding a crystal mine around these parts. You've been to this resort for a couple years and you've never seen or heard anything about a crystal mine around these parts outside of hiker gossip!

You had a mystery of your own. How was your dad able to afford such a summer house? He'd never tell you, he was always quick to change the subject. You knew he was a truck driver, but not even truckers make THAT kind of money in their lifetime!
Heck, once every week at night during vacation he'd say he was gonna go off to see some 'associates' of his. You dont know who these 'associates' are and he wont tell you anything about them.

One night he left to see those associates, you got bored. You had trouble sleeping and there wasnt anything on tv that peeked your interest. And since you forgot to bring your DS with you this summer, you had to resort to the last remaining option to seek entertainment: going outside.
You stepped outside and locked the door before heading up a hill to cool down and gaze at the scenery. You didnt stray too far from the summer home cuz you were aware of the wild pokemon that come out this late and you didnt have a pokemon of your own to defend yourself.

It was peaceful and relaxing. The stars lit up the night much clearer than back home. You could make out that little town in the distance with little little lit up houses that looked like fireflies.
Then just a couple yards away, you make out something real shiny and blue lying on the ground. Whatever it was, it shined awful bright in the darkness. Curiosity got the better of you and you walked over to see what it was.

Your eyes widened as you got closer to it, thinking you might have an idea what it is and is stunned with disbelief. Could it really be what you think it is? You almost gasped as the vision of it got more and more clearer!
Your jaw dropped and your unbelievable guess was wrong! It's a gemstone! An actual raw gemstone as big as your hand! A couple more gasps later, you scoop it up off the ground and stare at it with awe and amaze! The little gemstone was bright and beautiful. With a good careful carving, it'd make some nice jewelry. Is it valuable? Is it worth something? Is it a rather convincing fake? You'll find out tomorrow morning when you take it to an appraiser. As soon as you stashed it in your pocket, you saw ANOTHER bright shiny blue object a little ways away!

Sure enough, that was a gemstone, too! Just as bright, just as beautiful. You stash that away too. And then you see ANOTHER bright shiny blue gemstone! Hate for it to go to waste!

By now, you were already far past the safe zone from wild pokemon attacks, but those gemstones were too tempting to pass up! Before you could even realize how lost you just made yourself, you turned your full attention to the rock on the ground with several little blue gemstones sticking out of it. You were obligated to pick it up!
It was a rather odd looking rock. It had what looked like a puffy white collar. It felt all rubber-like when you poked it.

Suddenly, two bright blue eyes opened from the rock and peered up at you!

"Whoa!" you flinched and dropped the rock creature on the ground! It's eyes still gazed up at you from the dirt. It wasnt a rock! A pokemon, perhaps? A friendly reminder that you strayed too far from the safe zone!
Not wanting to spook it cuz you had no idea what kind of attacks it was capable of, you slowly backed away from it. You didnt notice the hole behind you!

"WHAAA!!" you screamed as you fell and then tumbled down a dark sloping rocky tunnel. You rolled down it for a minute before you stopped with your face in the dirt! Now your lost, out of the safe zone, and in a dark creepy tunnel. But on the plus side, you werent alone.

Oh no, you had PLENTY of company! Lifting your head from the dirt, you see dozens of bright blue eyes gazing your direction. Each one of them looked like that rock pokemon you picked up earlier! Now youre lost, out of the safe zone, in a dark creepy tunnel, in the middle of a nesting ground!

You did notice the alpha gemstone rock pokemon that stuck out above the rest who gazed at you with big shiny red eyes!
A grey feminine looking pokemon with what looked to be a headdress consisting of pink crystals and a pink diamond-cut in the center and wearing a white dress and a pink diamond necklace while her bottom half consisted completely of rock and raw pink gemstone! She seemed to be one of the more blingin' pokemon you've ever laid eyes on. Whatever that thing was she had on her head alone could probably buy you your own summer home!

Greed subsiding, you were heavily outnumbered by wild feral gemstone pokemon staring intently at you. You just tumbled down into their turf and they dont seem like theyre used to visitors.

Two options come to mind for you.

You could try to communicate with them, hopefully assure to them you mean no harm and hope that they wont brutally attack you and stain their bright beautiful gems with their blood!
Or you could run. Surely you can outrun a bunch of living rocks, right?
11133222111.title: Shine Bright Like a Diamond

choices: You Were Overthinking Things; Just Go Back Home And Go To Sleep
Concerned, You Go Back To The House Resolving To Talk To Your Father
Concerned, You Go Inside And Ask The Princess More About Her Aggressors
111332221111.content:
You got the feeling that the "princess"-looking pokemon—who was likely the leader among them—could be reasoned with, despite not having any real incentive to believe that. So, in an attempt to clear the air between you before things soured, you nervously introduced yourself to the pokemon, going as far as to bow to what was probably pokemon royalty before you. In a continued show of faith, you pulled out the gemstones you had stashed in your pocket and showed them off to the pokemon, explaining that you just so happened to find them along the trail you were walking along and that you mistook one of them for more gemstones before accidentally stumbling down into their den. That was how you found yourself in their cave, and since the gemstones seemed to lead up to their cave you assumed that they belonged to the pokemon; as much as it pained you, you left the gemstones on the ground and announced your intent to leave the pokemon be. Before you could make your way out of the cave, the pink "princess" pokemon had stopped you.
         "Do you really wish to leave?" came a feminine voice that had to be from the "princess". "Clearly you had planned to make use of the gemstones you have collected. Do you truly intend to leave them here like this?" You told her that the stones were likely theirs and you had no real right to take the stones from them. Again, before you leave, the pokemon had kept you from doing so, this time apparently giggling at you.
         "My, but you are a gentleman," the pokemon said. "So, I have decided to let you keep them for whatever it is you wish to do with them. How does that sound?" You were confused as to why the pokemon would let you leave with such priceless gemstones, but just as you were about to bend down and make good on the pokemon's offer she spoke again. "I had almost forgotten, but I shall allow you to keep the gemstones and leave…on one condition." The pokemon had closed the distance between you and took her place levitating above your head. "You see, recently we have had predators accosting our kind in the night, and truth be told we had placed those gemstones leading toward our nesting ground in an attempt to lure out these fiends." So that explained the gemstones leading you directly to this cave, but why would the pokemon want to lure anyone to their den? You voiced this to the "princess", and that was when you regretted asking her. Her eyes took on a hard look before she held her hand up high, and in an instant a brilliant pink sword materialized in her hand. Then she created a crude sculpture of a human bust out of the ground below, levitating it up to her before she tore through the sculpture's neck with her sword. Several of the other pokemon nearby then fired out light towards the fallen sculpture, encasing it in a hard diamond-like structure, and then the "princess" pokemon forced the diamond underground, burying it out of sight likely forever. You were super grateful that you decided to stay and explained yourself instead of running off.
         "I believe we can take on a fair amount of potential fiends looking to sell us off for a high price," the pokemon spoke, "but if knowledge of our grounds became common knowledge among your people it would be much more difficult for us to defend ourselves, and so I ask you that you keep your silence regarding our home. Then, you may be allowed to leave with the gemstones." It was a no-brainer that you would keep the location of the pokemon's cave a secret. That did beg another question though; you found the gemstones suspiciously close to where your summer home was located. While you didn't want to jump to any bad conclusions, there was a reason that the gemstones were placed so close to where your summer home was, and whatever that reason was you weren't sure you wanted to find out what it was. Either way, you promised the pokemon that your lips were sealed on the matter of her kind's nesting grounds. Hearing this made the "princess" smile bright, graciously giving you a curtsy.
         "I am ever so grateful," the pokemon said. "With this cleared up between us all, I suppose this is where you return home is it not? I bid you a pleasant night sir." You bowed in kind and finally made your way out of the cave; it was a bit of a steep climb but nothing impossible. On your way out of it you saw the small pokemon you had ran into on its way into the cave in a hurry. It didn't even seem to notice you, but oh well. Once you were out of the cave, you finally decided on how you were going to get home considering that you had effectively gotten lost, but to your surprise you found another trail of gemstones seemingly leading out of the forest you were in. Tempted beyond belief but restraining yourself, you merely followed the gemstones until you finally found yourself out of the forest. You saw this as the pokemon "princess's" way of getting you back home safely, and you silently thanked her. After some time walking along the trail you found your old man waiting for you right outside the front door of your summer home; he asked where you were of course, and you merely told him that you had taken a nightly stroll. While he did chastise you for straying a ways away from the house, he did pat you on the back for taking a stroll out in nature instead of burying your nose in a video game all day. Afterward the two of you went inside to your separate rooms and went to sleep, but you stayed up a little longer with that pokemon "princess" in your head. She was nice and understanding of you, and she was pretty too. Granted, she also had a scary side as with what she intended to do once she caught the one selling off her kind. Still, as long as she got justice you didn't mind it all too much, and with that you finally drifted off to sleep.
         The next day was largely uneventful, aside of waking up from a saucy dream involving you and the pokemon "princess" for some reason, but all in all the day passed by in relative peace and quiet. You had also taken a stroll to see if the pokemon had left more gemstones for suckers to come by but the area you were in was barren of them, so you returned home for the day. Before nightfall your father had left again to do more of his trucking business, and while you didn't really believe he made so much money off of trucking you didn't bother to press him any more on it. With nothing else to do you merely stood outside of your summer home just taking in the surrounding nature. All was good and quiet, at least until you noticed something odd. Not too far off from the house was the same kind of gemstone that you had collected the previous night. When you went over to investigate, you found yet another trail of gemstones leading deeper into the forest, the same one you found yourself lost in last night, albeit more spread out to not look so much like a deliberate trail. You followed them in and, just like you hoped it wouldn't, found yourself right outside of the pokemon's cave. A few unpleasant thoughts crossed your mind, and you remembered what the "princess" had said she intended to do to the night-owl perpetrators kidnapping her kind, and with your father disappearing for the evening again along with the fact that the gemstones were eerily close to your summer home unlike last night, the implications were disturbing to say the least…
111332221111.title: Coming To An Understanding

choices: Make A Display Of Swearing Fealty In Exchange For Your Life
Make A Display Of Threatening Them To Let You Go Home Unharmed
Make A Deal Of Surrendering Your Acquired Gemstones For Your Freedom
111332221112.content:
Pretty or not, these pokemon were wild and likely could not understand you no matter how hard you tried. Despite this, you made some effort of communicating your plan of leave to let the pokemon be in peace as you returned back home. After taking a few cautious steps, however, the pokemon in white held her hands together in a prayer-like gesture, and before long the entirety of the cave was alight with magical dazzle. However, the squares that now decorated the cave were a familiar shade of blue on the walls and ceilings and pink on the floor. Soon afterward, to your horror, you realize exactly what move this was: Trick Room. If you had a chance of escaping from the pokemon it was gone now; in a matter of seconds all of the other pokemon have surrounded you in speeds you didn't think possible for them, cutting off your escape completely. In short, in your wonder over the magic the pink diamond pokemon displayed, you were now trapped in the middle of numerous pokemon, and from their glittering eyes and gemstones you knew that the next few moments of your life could be your last.
         "Human…" came a stern, feminine voice—no doubt from the apparent "princess" of the pokemon. Said "princess" levitated her way over to you, and while her big and bright eyes of red and rose would normally be inviting and friendly, they were anything but as she looked your form over, eventually catching sight of the gemstones you had collected on your way there. Almost immediately her eyes turned cold when they met with yours again, and then she held her hand up high. Drawing energy from the surrounding air, she was then holding a bright pink sword in her hand in the next instant, and before you could even react she slashed at you in a blinding flurry—or rather at your pants. They fell uselessly to the ground in shreds, and out fell the gemstones you had been collecting. You could hear the gasps of the other pokemon surrounding you, and before long their eyes went hostile and their gems began to glow a ghastly blue as they glared daggers at you. Of course, their princess was also holding the blade of her sword up near your neck; one wrong move and she'd have your head.
         "You have defiled the sanctity of our home by trespassing upon our nesting grounds in your greed for riches…" you could hear her say in your head. "This is a grave transgression that I cannot abide." Desperate, you tried explaining to this pokemon that it was never in your intention to wander into her den—you were honestly just taking a stroll and happened to see the gemstones that were now on the ground, merely collecting them and planning to take them home with you. For a moment, it almost seemed as though this pokemon believed you, but just when you thought things were looking up, another pokemon came in from the outside. It was likely the same one you had dropped in shock upon finding out what it really was, and everyone's attention was drawn to it as it squeaked out some pokemon speak you couldn't understand. Whatever it was that it said, it didn't sound good because everyone's attention was back on you, and if you didn't think your life was at any more risk the pokemon surrounding you were now explicitly charging up some sort of attack. The princess now had the tip of your blade pressing at your throat; with your ruined pants around your ankles and hands up in the air, you had no real way to defend yourself now.
         "It seems that your true character has been revealed," the pokemon princess hissed. "You had attempted to abscond with one of our kind in tow in your bid to attain riches." You tried to argue otherwise but felt the blade press against your throat to the point you thought the pokemon would pierce it if she went any further. "Do not lie to me. I saw the way you looked at me when you arrived—at the diamond encrusted upon my brow." Inwardly you cursed yourself for looking at the pokemon that way earlier because now it was coming back to bite you in the ass. "You are just like the last humans who had come into our grounds to sell our kind—A lying. Kidnapping. Enslaver—and just like them you will face judgment as I shall now send you to Arceus. Have you any final words you wish to say?" With so little time left on the clock and scared out of your mind that you were dealing with a pokemon intent on killing you, you quickly ran over what cards you had left to play…
111332221112.title: Running Does You No Good Here

choices: ...It bounced off your head. (They believe youre caught!)
...It bounced off your head. (They believe it failed!)
1113322211121.content:
Not only was your time limited, so were your options. Threatening a potential mythical pokemon will no doubt end the way you imagine it would (or even WORSE than you would imagine, most likely!). And trying to make a trade your newly found gemstones in exchange for your life is pointless, considering she could just kill you and take the stones anyways! If you wanted to survive the wrath of a possible high-leveled but intelligent pokemon of assumed royalty that had a blade to your neck, you knew what you had to do.

"W-Wait, your majesty!!" you stumble as you address her by royalty, "please spare my life! I'll offer you fealty in exchange!!”

“Die?” she literally spouted out loud in a surprised and awfully cutesy tone of voice which did not match the voice you heard in your mind! Not that it mattered at the moment, cuz you were too spooked out when the first word you heard her say was 'Die'! You remind yourself that she's a pokemon and is probably just muttering part of her name like all the others and she's not actually telling you to die! You hope.

“Y-Yes, it'd be a tremendous waste to kill me!” you bargain, “there is so much I can offer you as your servant… your majesty.” She said nothing, but tilted her head as the other rock monsters gazed at you unblinkingly.
To SHOW your loyalty, as soon as she lowered the blade from your throat, you get down on your knees and bow to her.
“My beloved princess, I beg of you to grant me a second chance at life. And I shall be indebted to you as your loyal most trustworthy servant! Though I am not worthy of your grace, it will be an absolute honor to serve you, my liege!"

You keep your facade going despite the tense, possibly distrusting stares from the glowing-eyed rock monsters all around you. Perhaps they knew you were full of it, but the ultimate decision rested on their well-armed diamond-studded princess. Through the corner of your eye, you can spot a look of curiousness as if she was honestly considering your offer. You hoped she couldnt hear the distant thoughts in the back of your mind of escaping her as soon as you get the opportunity, but even if she did, it didnt matter. Because she had something else on her mind regarding this offer.

"Wait a moment," you heard her dainty and profound voice in your mind again, "this offer of servitude... from one species to another..." you didnt like hearing THAT part, "could this be a similar if not exact circumstance to that of the enslavers?" You figured out pretty fast what she's getting at, but she had to solidify it. "Instead of one of my kind being captured by one of yours..." She points to herself, "It would be ME..." then she points to you "capturing YOU?"

"Er, I'm not sure about that."

Unfortunately she wasnt asking YOU.

"I believe that is indeed the case!" you heard another voice reply in your mind, most likely coming from one of her close rocky minions, "well done, Princess! You have just captured a wild Human!". Oh boy.

"Diaaan!!" she let out a high-pitched squeal of delight while the elegant voice in your head shouted "Hooray!" Quite a silly turn of events, but it wasnt over yet!

"Wait a minute, princess!" you heard another voice interject, coming from another close minion, "the capturing ritual is still not complete!" She turns to him as he explains. "To officially capture him, youre required to throw one of those sacred orbs the enslavers carry to properly ensnare him." Ah of course. She doesnt have a pokeball to catch you! ...Er, those things cant ensnare humans, can they?
"I see. That is indeed a shame." her dainty voice sighs while outside, she lets out a pout of disappointment and frowns.

"Do not fret, my lady!" said another voice from another minion, "we managed to find one of those sacred orbs an enslaver dropped as he fled! Here!" It actually had a pokeball! She beamed with delight as her minion handed her the ball. You felt very nervous and uncomfortable as she eyed the ball with intrigue. You wanted to tell her that it doesnt work that way (at least you hoped it didnt!), but you knew better and didnt want her to change her mind and decide to kill you again! For your own good, it was best to just play along.

"How does this sacred orb work?" she asks, eyeing the pokeball carefully.
"I think you just push the button on it and throw it at me," you assumed, "at least, that's how I seen it work."

Doing as you said, she presses the button and she and her minions jump and gasp on reflex when the ball expands. After that, the princess maintains her composure and stares you right in the eye.

"Alright, human," you hear her speak to you, "are you prepared to enter into my beloved kingdom? To pledge your loyalty to my crown and it's citizens? To serve and obey the will of your new Matriarch for the rest of your life?"
You swallowed hard and nodded, "I am, your majesty."

Then with a nod, she raised her arm back and with one hard swing and shout of "YANCIIIIEE!!!", she hurled that pokeball at you!
1113322211121.title: PLEASE DONT CATCH THEM ALL!!

choices: Allow The Princess To "Detain" You For The Time Being
Argue Your Case To Be Freed Without Further Issue
1113322211122.content:
It was probably one of the dumbest things you could have done, but you decided to make a scary face and intimidate the Pokemon into letting you leave. You imagined an ursaring, rearing up its body with its claws high into the air, and channeling that ursaring into you did you stand up boldly and let out what you thought was your most impressive "roar". Against all odds, it looked like it actually worked; the Pokemon who were poised to attack you were refraining from doing so, opting to watch your next closely. Keeping up with the theatrics, you continued the display as you tried to slowly shuffle back toward the exit of the cave. Just a little more and you were home free—! And then, almost as if the powers that be were cursing you for your stupidity, you ended up stepping on your own fucking shoelace, and with your tattered pants still at your ankles you promptly fell forward and landed your face right into the ground. You were almost certain that you might have broke your nose the rocky floor, and just like that your little show of intimidation was cut stupid short. Slowly, you rolled yourself over bemoaning how dumb you were—clutching your bleeding nose and continuing to curse yourself. Here you were, pants at your ankles and totally defenseless—it would be all too easy for the "princess" to finish you off now, yet a few seconds in and you hadn't heard anything from the pokemon. Chancing a glance up at your soon-to-be captors, you could see that they all had ceased their attack completely, and while the "princess" still had her sword in hand she was currently staring at you with the most disbelieving stare a pokemon could muster.
         "Oh, Arceus help me," the pokemon's voice rang out in your head. "You cannot possibly be this incompetent and weak." The words surely riled you up and you were about to tell the pokemon off—if only you hadn't stood so fast and not set your balance correctly, falling flat on your ass for your efforts. You felt a particularly hard rock nearly shove itself up your ass very literally upon your fall, doing your best (and inevitably failing) to suppress a most undignified whimper. Losing whatever strength you had, you just fell over and curled up on your side, too weak to try nursing your wounds and more interested in crying miserably on the ground and hoping that the powers that be take pity on you and end you to spare you further humiliation.
         "Pitiful…" the pokemon "princess" lamented. "Perhaps I was too hasty in my judgment; you are clearly no threat to our kind—least of all in the pitiable state you are in now." Well that was certainly comforting but also kind of annoying to hear nonetheless. You took a few minutes to yourself to sulk, at least until you thought you were fine enough to stand and walk on your own again. No more in any mood to continue conversation with the "princess" you made your intentions as clear as can be and finished it off with saying that you just wanted to forget that any of this ever happened and go on about your life. Before you tripped over yourself again, you took off the pants around your ankles, and before you were making your way out of the cave you told the pokemon that if anyone asked that you'll claim that whatever pokemon lived around in the forest let you off easy. Turning back around and skulking your way out of the cave, you didn't notice that a giant pink diamond that wasn't there before was now blocking your way out.
         "I think not," the pokemon spoke to you. "We are being hunted by poachers who wish to sell off our kind for material riches, and given how easily you seem to bruise if anyone were to threaten you about our whereabouts…you will squeal like a Mankey if pressed for information. For now, it is in our best interest to detain you here with us. Or do you object?" The sword in the "princess's" hand had never left, and noticing how she had tightly gripped it made you think twice about immediately rebuffing her. Still, if you were not home in time when your father returned, you would quickly be reported a missing person and the authorities would tear up the whole of the forest searching for you. If the "princess" intended on keeping you, it would be better to notify others first, but something told you that this was no mere "detaining"…

11222.content:
VACATION TIME!!

After a stressing semester mixed with backbreaking labor to afford it, you and a few of your old pals finally get to take some time off to chillax for vacation at a nice tropical island resort. The place was expensive, but it was well worth it to relax in a nice cozy luxury hotel room, gorge on some killer exotic food, admire such beautiful sights that you just couldnt experience at home, and maybe catch a pokemon or two!

...In Pokemon Go. Sadly, you were the only member of your group that wasnt an actual pokemon trainer, so you decided to cope with catching imaginary ones on your smart phone. Redundant, I know. But how else are ya gonna get your pokemon fix?

And your fix peeked your curiosity when you found out you could catch wild Zoroarks in a forest beyond the resort. Against common sense and by yourself without any protection, you told your friends you'd be back in a while and you naively left the safety and security of the resort to go catch a Zoroark on your phone.

You treked awful deeper in the unknown woods than you shouldve searching in vain for a Zoroark. You paced around quite a while, but still no sighting. All the while, you had the strangest feeling you were being watched. You couldve sworn you caught a glimpse of a twinkling feral slanted blue eye peeking through the bushes, but you shrugged it off and kept searching...

Hours passed. Night falls. The battery in your smart phone which doubled as your GPS had long died. You were lost. You just started your damn vacation and already it's come to THIS! You rummaged through the woods searching for the way back, but lost count of the number of times you passed by the same bush, same shallow creek, same collapsed tree, same Snorlax sleeping awful peacefully in the middle of a lake. You didnt even know which direction was north anymore. Even after climbing a tree and scanning out in the distance, you couldnt see the resort anywhere.

“Damn it! Damn it! Damn it!” you constantly tell yourself while smacking your head with your phone. You paced around aimlessly trying not to flip out, but you mentally nag to yourself about how you shouldnt have done what you did. You knew it was a bad idea! You knew you shoulda brought one of your friends along. Sure they'd be annoyed at you for wasting so much time playing your stupid game, but it beats THIS scenario by a long shot!

“HELLO?!” you finally resort to shouting for help, “ANYBODY HERE? ANYBODY?” Sadly, your shouts dont even succeed in “HELLO?! HELLO!!!”

“..Zor?” Your prayers were answered. In the blink of an eye, help had already appeared before you and you got a nice look at your brand new friend. This girl looked about your age... with long slightly spikey red hair wrapped in a long pony tail thanks to a blue bead, a black tattered shirt that was too short to cover her belly-button, a short equally tattered black skirt, red makeup around her eyes and the ends of her lips, and big blue eyes that had a feral twinkle in them as she stared your direction with intrigue.

You dont remember seeing a girl like her back at the resort. Maybe she's one of the native girls of this island. Is there a tribal area nearby?

"Hello!" you raised your hand and politely greeted her. She merely tilted her head a little and kept staring at you. Well, she SEEMS nice. Maybe nice enough to help you find your way back?

"Excuse me," you say to her, "I'm a little lost."

"Zaaa...?" she replied in a questionable expression.

She stared at your feet as she walked a little closer to her.

"I was wondering if you could help me find my way back?"

"Heeeeel....p? Baa...ck?" she thoroughly pronounced those words as she stared at you oddly. Maybe she doesnt speak English. Guess this was gonna be a lot harder than you thought.

"I'M..." you pointed to yourself, "LOST..." You shrugged your arms and shook your head. "YOU..." you pointed to her. "HELP me," you swayed your arms toward yourself and patted your chest.

"Heellllp... ME...." she slowly repeated what you said.

"PLEASE," you cupped your arms in a begging expression, "HELP ME... find HOME. HOME..."

"Hoooome... hooome. Home!" she repeated with excitement, "Find home! Find Home!" Hm, did something click?

"Yes!" you nodded and smiled, "Can you please help me?"
"Find home!" the girl smile and nodded, "Find home!" And in a quick unpredictable instant, she ran toward you! No, she CHARGED at you! You had less than a second to drop your smile before you tripped and fell on the ground from the surprise!
She still stared down at you, smiling wide grinned. Although her smile looked cute, the pointed fangs in the middle of her pearly white teeth were kinda intimidating.
"W-What are you doi-"

"Find home! Home!!" then out of the blue, she grabbed your foot and literally starting DRAGGING you with her! Besides the fact that she was pretty strong, just casually dragging you by your foot like that... that's an awful weird reaction even from a native islander!

"Wh-what are you doing?" you questioned her. She didnt answer. Instead, she continued dragging and sang, "Find home! Find home! Find home!" on the way! Did you say her favorite words of the day or something? Whatever she was doing, she was in an awful rush to do it!
"W-w-wait!" you pleaded, "where are you taking me?!"
She finally stopped in her tracks, but only to look down at you and repeat, "Find HOME!" She even winked when she said that! As you pondered the meaning behind that statement, she resumed dragging you off!

This was possibly the strangest night you've had in a long time. You've gotten yourself lost in the woods looking for video game dlc and abducted by a native girl who doesnt seem to speak english yet is fine repeating it! Especially the words 'find home'. Maybe she's taking you home. Maybe to HER home. While youre curious to find out where she lives, you probably should be getting back to YOUR vacation home before your friends start to worry.

Then again, this'll probably be the most fun you'll have on this vacation. Hooking up with one of the native girls would be a fitting end to this adventure!

.....


.....Then AGAIN, why does her shadow look completely different?
