113211.content:
I have always thought to be a good trainer, or at least an acceptable one. Doubts torment my psyche, recent doubts. My dream are tormented by my own regret, or maybe my inaction. I know that i could have stopped this, but in truth, i didn't want to.

"No don't!" Crash

"Stop Dammit! Not the vase, not the vase!" Trum

"The hell with this! Rick, in here now!"

Thats my cue, since that night, no one touch Kira, my Espeon, my beautiful Espeon. Life taste bitter these days, perhaps it's just me. I must get over this, i Know. My eyes open and my head clear itself while the light of the Pokemon center blind me for a moment. Deciding that self reminiscence wouldn't be helpful now, i get up and start walking at a leisure peace towards the back door, you know, those doors. A soon as i got close i hear the soft hissing of the pressure, circle in the air tubes pushing the door open, what a lazy bastard i must be, i don't even open my own doors these days. Still at my pace i walk thought the internal withe, stained corridor of the center, until i reach a door marked as "Check Room". Usually soft growling and pleasured purr could be heard from here. Now angry hissing and what i only can hear, a voice.

"Stay back you miserable human!"

Here we go. Slightly pushing the door open, i realize that maybe i am not as lazy as i have thoughts, and the scene from my mind, my torment, appear before me.

Kira my beautiful Espeon is on the examination table, on all fours, staring at the nurse with venom in her normally delicate eyes. I can feel her anger, and her unpleasantness at being here. The nurse kinetically pushed away, try uselessly to gain ground toward Kira, desperation and tiredness in her feature. Time seems frozen, in this surreal scene, then finally i speak.

"Kira, enough"

"Master! Bring me away, i don't need this, this checkup! I am fine!"

I stop for a moment, breath in, breath out, then with a condescending tone "Kira, i have already told you, your check are mandatory, i must know that you are healthy"

"But i don't need them! Only you master, only you may touch me" The she purposely add In ANY way you want, Master" With this, always with this, she start purring.

Despite our talk, Kira is strong enough to keep the nurse pinned near the wall, stained, with what. Decency, arrogance, ignorance. Yes. This milky white walls are stained with this, and more. The worst of all sin, hypocrisy, pride. Hard to say if it's mine, if it was mine, or still is.

With firm, strong voice i add "Release her Kira, now!"

purrr "Yes master!" The kinetic field collapse harmlessly to the ground, bringing the nurse with it, Kira your humor is appreciated, most of the time.

Yes she is my torment, my joy, my damnation and my redemption. I love her.

I realized this too late however. I have raised my Kira since she was an Eevee, watch she transform to my beauty now before me, i have felt her prodding, in my feeling, in my emotions, than i accepted what was already know to me, witch i have always denied. I like Pokemon, yes, but i love my Kira.
Everything changed, subterfuge gone, advances, never refused, all only for That Day, the night when i took my Kira for the first time, the night when we become mates.

"I am sorry nurse, perhaps another time?"

"Hmpf, sure Rick, but mind explaining to me what happened to her? She was never this aggressive" You said that to me? How wonderful, very acute from you o mistress of..

"Master! Let's go, i want you, all for myself" purrrrrrrr

"Puberty?" My answer seems logical enough, and it's also part of my torment, i am 16 and i have a life-mate, an insatiable one, both for my presence and for my body. Or at least a part of it. I Know that she loves me, my mind as well, what I am, or maybe she just love the one who raised her, and she find "logical", not being her father, to love me. My torment, once again as i look those beautiful eyes, i could have stopped it, but i didn't want to. I wanted her. I want her. I WILL have her, as much as i desire. She will oppose no resistance, why? Because she loves me. Because i love her.

"Let's go Kira"

"Yes Master! I am yours!" She heard me, of course. This is my torment. She is mine, because I Wanted her, desired her, and so i got her.

I can only hope, in my redemption. As we left the white stained corridor of the center, i can only think of my desire, that she really love me back.

"I always will Master!" I exhale softly as we come near our home. As soon i come near the door, it start moving on it's on, the latch come undone, the lock click repeatedly in their holes, the door open.

Where are home Master! Do you wish to have me? Master?

I exhale again, and answer truthfully "Yes"

purrrrrr

My Kira, my beautiful Kira, walk in with me and close the door behind her, locking it once again.

"Kira, wait"

"Yes Master?"

"Didn't i told you to call me Rick"

"Of course you have Master, 24 times" I start getting angry, is she mocking me?

"But then" she start coming closer to me, with those eyes, the one i want. purrrrrrrrrr "You always love when i scream, Master. Yes?"

"Kira.."

"I am yours, to do as you please, i love you"

"Yes, you do"

purrrrr With this she go to the bathroom to "clean up", i know sounds strange but she always want to give herself a good cleaning before bed. Maybe i will be lucky and i can tire her enough for avoid our activities tonight. It's not that i don't want her, it's just...

I need to think more on this. With my little introspection over, i strengthen my will, and go towards the bathroom.

I stop in the middle of the room, revelation. I need to remember what happened that night. Yes it's the only way.

That night, the night when everything changed, the night i have claimed Kira, as my own.
I close my eyes, in the middle of the room, i hear the soft noise of the shower running, undoubtedly Kira is planning, as always. I let the noise fade, the feelings of my body slowly disappear, and my memory resurface from the depths of my mind.

"Kira, come the dinner is ready!" Well i thought, her chow and my pasta anyway. I should learn to cook better. I had eat enough pasta and pizza for a lifetime by now.

"Coming!" What she is doing upstairs? I thought she was in the garden, oh well, matters not.

I hear Kira coming down the stairs in a hurry, and a few moments later, appear before my eyes. Kira evolved the last week, she was sooooo happy, and i am too, finally she has become what she has always dreamt to be, an Espeon, my beautiful Espeon. Yes there is pride in the tone you hear this all about, i am prideful of my little Kira, she as trained hard and now reaps the fruits of all her hard work. I still remember the blinding light, just after i congratulate her on her new move: Trump Card. With this we will be able to give a nasty surprise to our next opponent. Ha, they think that Eevee is weak? We'll see now who really deserve the prize. Yes i was and still am a little possessive, both of my Pokemon and of my score, my battle score of course. 1132111.title: The Night

11321112.content:
My reminiscence end there, Kira is calling

While my inner thoughts are still a secret to her, all my surface one can be easily read, i can try to put up a barrier using my will, but she immediately ask: Why? She do not understand that i still want my privacy, she still Doesn't understand that what have we done should have required more than just willingness. My desire put me in this situation, and i am still not convinced that my lust isn't responsible for everything that has happened that night.

While i decide to put this strays ideas to rest, at least for now, my instinctual mental barrier flare up, something strong, powerful is trying to speak to me, something dark, distant, desperate. I put my hand on my head, it's like my brain is going on fire! Pain surge from within, then suddenly, the presence lessen his attack, relief slowly return to me, i feel incredibly tired, and i am aware that i am wobbling, mi vision is blurred, my eyelids heavy, whats happening?.

"Master! Are you alright? I cant feel you, whats going on?!" I want to answer her but i can't, my body heat leave me and a strange coolness take it's place, all my sensory perception is shutting down, i feel like i am dying. I desperately try to use my hand to grab on something, anything, but my coordination is unresponsive as the rest of my body, then i can't stay up anymore, i fall down.

"Master! Pl a e! M s er! Ma r!" Darkness swallows me whole, this is my punishment? This is the price i must pay? No redemption, no second chance, only the abyss.



I am floating. I am nowhere. Bubble of indescribable paste like material seems to cling to me like a swarm of hungry locust. I don't feel pain, i don't feel anything. I can think, but i am empty. I can move but i have no body. My very essence has been extracted from my shell, and brought here. I am not afraid, i have no reason to, why? Could any torment release me from my sin? I have conditioned my pokemon, my Kira, my love. I have convinced her that giving herself to me physically, was the next step in our relationship, but what kind of relation is based on lust, anger and desire? Not a good one, not Love.

My self imposed chastisement end abruptly, when a presence, the very same that brought me here, grip my soul with a dark, tendril like claws and bring it before him.

I feel my weight again, my senses return to me, my limbs let themselves be felt again, and before me an image, a projection, real as this world, appear in my sight.

Strong, deep voice, like a whisper in the dark but strong enough to make you deaf, your very ears bleed, to beg to never be used again, resonates in every fiber of this dark place.

[Form] "Greetings, Rick Cullen the third, and welcome to my humble home, please take a seat, i wish to speak with you"

I suppose that giving you my cell number won't suffice. Great, with my senses my wits returned as well, i am tempted to see it's reaction if i

[Form] "Do not worry, you are not dead, not yet, i just want to...clear, some of your doubts about the very reason of your presence here"

So far so good "What do you mean by saying, not yet"

[Form] "As i have said, do not worry, death come for all but a few, and in fact, this is one of the arguments of which I would like discuss"

I know only few that can even think of "Discuss about death, or about end"

[Form] "You are, as i have hoped, very perceptive. Death and the end, are not the same thing, many do not realize what this phrase mean, perhaps you do?"

I am not a fool "Of course not, i may be arrogant enough to be convinced of the verity behind my action, but i am not foolish enough to think that My action and My emotion are always my own, nor i think that they are mine beyond the basic meaning of such words. No, anyone who believe differently bring the weight of the world on his own shoulder, alas not our action, or belief, are ours by right, many are imposed by moral, society, form and the most important of all, hypocrisy. Believing that my action are only my own, is like thinking that the universe respond only to me, only to my belief. Nonsense"

[Form] "A curios, but not far from the truth statement, tell me Rick Cullen the third, how do You judge yourself"

Does it try to put my things in prospective? "In doubt"

[Form] "Of what? Your innocence or about your guiltiness"

Am i tested? "Neither, i am not innocent as i am not guilty, i am just myself, and my action. I do not need to justify them, just accept them"

A murmur, a pleased one? [Form] "In the end, your punishment is clear, acceptance, quite the heavy sentence you brought upon yourself. Many just think that they have done something wrong, but do not really understand how, or why, nor question it, only escape or punishment. How limited they are. To accept your action, is to try to understand both the event and the reason that triggered it, anything else is just empty rhetoric about justice. Like a mere mortal can know something about it. How could You judge someone based on proof that do not explain the how, or why. Like those fools at the church, reading an empty withe book, filled with dark lies"

The church of creation? "The church is a lie then? Their fanaticism a mere illusion?"

A dark, deep heavy chuckle resonate with you, resonate with this whole...world? [Form] "Of course, how can They knew anything about creation, was they present? Did Arceus told them anything, or they merely guessed, saw what They wanted to see, a mere surface with little importance, shape matters not to me, nor to Arceus"

Your doubts leave you, the truth make you feel more heavy that you thought ever being possible, not about the church, nor your guilt, but your blindness, toward Kira, and toward yourself, finally you see. Acceptance brought you the redemption and the answer that had eluded you since that night.

I am guilty of having conditioned my Kira? Yes.

Do i deserve punishment for it? No, i wanted her as she wanted me. What happened was nothing more than acceptance, a recognition of our Want and Volition. Nothing else.

[Form] "You understand now? Only your lack of acceptance was punishing you, not me, not Arceus, nor Kira"

"I forced her"

Another chuckle, this time stronger resonate in me [Form] "Forced? How? She wanted you since the very beginning, since the day she choose her final form. You binded her true essence, the very moment you decided to bring her home. It was inevitable, other trainers" it say the word with spite "think that it's unnatural, like love could ever be unnatural, stupid yes, but never wrong"

Damned, this word echo in my mind, Damned. Now i know for sure, this form is the ever damned, the ever banished "Giratina, will you give me the honor of showing you real form to me?"

[Form] "You took your time to ask, a was curios if you have the strength of hearth to ask me that very question"

The form slowly take shape
[Form] "And the answer" The form solidify and finally Her real appearance stand before you

Her voice become nearly melodious, even if it's still pretty deep, and it's still resonate withing you, fear is replaced by a strange belonging, and even...attraction?

[Giratina] "Let me greet you once more. Welcome, Rick Cullen, welcome to the distortion world, the limbo of the dead, the very ship that deal with the soul of the departed, until their time come" Their time?

[Giratina] "Time for redemption, or punishment"

"Greetings to you ferr, no. Hello Giratina, i have the strange feeling that i have missed you for so long"

She smile. A smile that would send running away the bravest of warrior, but just entice you to know more.

[Giratina] "It's not missing, it's belonging, the very reason why i am trapped here, banished from the light of world. Do not worry, Rick, i will explain everything in due time, both your presence here, and your feeling, although your propose you must find yourself"

I start to feel light, empty, i am returning, awakening

[Giratina] "I am truly sorry, for the method i used to bring you here, i promise that next time it will be more pleasant. Goodbye, Rick, i am not death, but i still will prevent your demise, should the unthinkable happen"

Light, it blind me. Heat, my body, my hearth it's still beating.

[Giratina] "Return now, and love Kira as you should, and when ready.."

Darkness, constant beeping noise, a weight on my stomach; soft firm fur.

Light, a voice, revival.

"Esp!" "Master! you are alive!"

The growling deepens, so much that i suspect that being thrown out by the window is not a remote chance now.

Joy exit the room, and i remain alone with my Kira. I am at disadvantage now, she has never moved since i waked up, although she has stopped treating me like her favorite cornet, hopefully a good thing. But i can't hear her, and from the look of confusion in her face, she can't either.

I try to determine what kind of ungodly hour is, and to my surprise, only now i notice the starred sky behind my window, and the absolute silence of the center, must be quite late, how much time was i...suspended? I wait for Joy to return which she did, trying to leave me again as soon as the plate touch my stomach. "Off! joy!"

"Yes Dearest?"

"What's happened, i am serious i have felt like dying." Her face become serious, and so her tone

"We don't know, we have tried everything, but we was unable to determine the cause " She pause for a moment, in deep thinking "The only clue we had, was a sort of" she put her hands in the hair flexing two fingers, and using a deep bored tone "An mysterious dark wall of shadow" she lower her hands, and recover her normal voice "That our local Kadabra have found, she told us that that....wall...was Made of shadows, a ghost like power she has mentioned, it think, and she has said that the wall covered you memory as well, so we was unable to determine What has caused it." She look at Kira "Kira here told us that you blacked out, and unable to wake you up she Teleported here screaming in my mind like and obsessed, i have never thought that teleport could do that, i mean i know that a pokemon can choose any unimpeded destination that they Can See, within limit of course, and any place they know well, but no pokemon ever teleported Inside the center, inside My Private room, Kira Never entered there, how she was able.....mphf, still, she mentioned this wall as well, but nothing we did worked, and while you seemed a little pale, your body was in a stable condition, or at least as stable an a near dead body can be."

My mind is in turmoil right now, was Giratina responsible? Probably, but this wall "Will it go away?"

She understand what i mean "I don't know, kathia our Kadabra, said that the wall is slowly dispersing, so i think that in a few hours Kira will be able to speak to you again, and that your memory will return as well" My memory? I remember everything, even a little too much if you ask me. " My memory is intact Joy"

She look at me with stupor, then "It is? Curios, we assumed, bha, no matter"

She observe the monitor with something akin to fascination "Your biological value are a little...off, but nothing serious, i will keep you here for the night in observation, tomorrow if the value are ok, I'll dismiss you"

I lazily exhale while i walk towards the bedroom while i hold Shade close to me, i feel her paw tightening their grip on my arms, she is keeping her eyes closed and her purring is strong enough to be heard a few meters away. I feel a strange closeness to this Umbreon, i do not understand why, but i don't want to lose her, she is...important to me

I recover from my introspection, and not a moment too soon, we reach the door that lead to my bedroom, i open it with one hand, careful to not drop Shade, and bring us both in, i leave the door half open and them lay down on bed whit Shade on my chest.

I let my mind wander while i lazily pet Shade dark, soft fur. I try to understand what really happened this morning, trying to ordinate the series of events that has brought me here, with an Umbreon purring on my chest.

First everything started mostly normal, then an Evee in the forest, the same Evee that start to tease and, not a minute later present herself, me mating with her, then the Jolteon broking the windows and practically rape me, a forceful mating with Umbreon, then the Espeon try to use me like a puppet but i literally explode and...i sexually dominate her, fully.

I admit, while my rage was justified i have exaggerated, pokemon are not just tools, but i was so angry...it doesn't matter now, she may deny it as much as she want, but that Espeon enjoyed being subdued and mated so roughly, after all she could have at least try to stop me, instead she submitted and permitted me do whatever i wanted with her. I think that i will reserve that same treatment to her in the future, perhaps i will be able to make her admit her feelings as well.

While my mind is occupied, my hand involuntary descend toward Shade tail "Breo?" i feel dampness on my finger and i immediately recover from my daydreaming.

"Breoooon" I notice that my hand has descended under Shade tail, and i have started to caress her vulva, i want to retract my hand....but i can't, i don't know why but..

I continue to play with my Shade, then before things start to become too hot, i stop, bringing her muzzle close to my face, Shade open her crimson eyes and stare straight into mine, i can clearly see the happiness and the affection towards me. There unexpectedly, she close her eyes and kiss me, and i reciprocate without hesitation. It take at least a minute before we finish and my mind start t process what has actually happened.

Shade return in her original position on my chest, and relax. I don't know what's happened, but i am certain that i have wanted her, wanted her affection. It's with these thoughts that start my voyage in the lands of dreams.

Every season is the same story! Every time! First the Mightyena pack, then the Dragonairs and last summer nothing less than a Scyther!

She can get uncontrollable when during this period of the year, especially if she hasn't mated yet. I may seems strange but when the season come Chrystal is actually the shyer of us, despite being the second eldest she has mated far less than any of us, excluded Eve of course, and that lead to a lot of frustration on her part that she promptly release on us at the earliest opportunity.

I may not have a direct type advantage over her, but her element is not particularly efficient against mine, so i decide to stand my grounds and try to talk civilly with her

"Chrystal be reasonable, i understand that your pride may be,,disturbed by the idea of mating with a human, but really there is no reason to be this angry! After all he can't sire our eggs and still satisfy our cravings!"

She stop walking towards me and seat down, a strange smile on her muzzle

I continue: "Beside is not that he should be lacking in that department either, so why are you so opposed?"

Chrystal smile become a little creepy and with a tone between mocking and amused: "Dearest sister, do you know that while normally not possible there are way for make us conceive with him? Granted is nearly impossible at the moment, having it vanished who know where end all.....but he could still use us as breeders! He is just waiting for the right moment to strike! And then we will all be his slave, forced to do his every bidding!"

At the word bidding, Chrystal shot an Icebeam just above my head, purposely missing me, then i hear the stone of our cave grind, and turning my head backwards i notice how a good chuck of the rock is now on the ground frozen and shattered

Chrystal still pissed continue: "How can you not understand Acqua?! He just want to use us and keep our family member like pets!"

------------Flare POV-----------
No! It's not true! He offered to become a family, and Viria seems to trust him!

"No! You are lying! You don't know what he wants! Nor his desire or what he will do!"

Chrystal turn towards me, still infuriated but i insist: "You barely meet him, but i was there, he offered us to become a family! A real one not just pets! Beside Viria trust him to respect our wishes and Love us! Instead of living in a...Cave!"

Chrystal is growling at me, but i will not be intimidated any more, not when such a promising future is so close: "You wanted to live in this cave! You refused to mate with all the pokemon that offered! And still you convinced Viria to abandon our old home! Your distrust and ignorance are the cause of all of this! We are alone oh great icequeen, what other inauspicious act you wish us to fulfil your freezeness?!"

Chrystal feature now contorted with rage shoot another Icebeam at me, but i counter it with a Flamethrower, the very proof of my claim! She make us abandon our old home!

Despite her strength, the anger give me the boost i need to push her attack back, and unexpectedly, Acqua join with Scald and distract Chrystal enough for my attack to hit, causing a small explosion as soon as the pressurized water and my flame touch each other.

I look at my stubborn, unmoving sister, that now bear a visible burn on her left side. She should be alight, painful but not really debilitating or anything

I look at Acqua: "We should go, she may get up at any moment and i....i want to...you know the human...it's getting worse"

Acqua: "Viria can deal with her if she persist, beside she is feeling this too, and if not her mind, then her body will force her to see reason, or at least get a good romp and finally.."

Chrystal: "Glaaaaa"

"She is getting up! Let's go, now!"

Me and Acqua ran out of the cave as fast as our legs allow, and maybe even a little more. I have no intention of meeting Chrystal before having spoken to Viria, hopefully she will know what to do

The enraged Glaceon turn towards me, a fire that beacon a lust for combat can be spotted on her eyes, i prepare myself as it's already clear how this confrontation will end

Christal with a spiteful tone: "You KNOW DAMN WELL, Sister, i will Not accept to be...be..A PET TO THESE FILTHY HUMAN!"

Here we go again, i have hoped that leaving our old home behind would have let her bury the past with it, but it seems that i was wrong, poor Chrystal i understand her anger, but i don't justify her methods

Calmly i reply: "Sister, please, we are not your enemies, we are a family we are here to help you. Leave the past in the shadow were it belong, don't let it cloud your vision with unjustified anger, let u-"

Chrystal interrupt me: "THE PAST?! WHAT PAST SISTER?! DON'T YOU SEE IT?! WE ARE WILLINGLY LET HIM ENSLAVE US! I WILL NEVER ALLOW-"

"Sister, Enough! I don't Want to hear Anything about Your suffering, did you believe that i enjoyed our condition then? All in all he wasn't the worst possible thing that could have happened to us, there are far worse human around, believe me on that"

I start to have enough of her blabbering, between her heat and her bad character she can become uncontrollable sometimes

Chrystal anger flare at my words, i was right, she entered this house with the only purpose of starting a fight, so be it

Chrystal tone become menacing, cold: "You suffering? The Great and Powerful Viria can even feel pain? Sister, i was pretty sure that the moan of pleasure you gave him had nothing to do with pain"

My tone become sad: "Chrystal, what that human, that breeder did to us was wrong, we was the elders you and i with our sisters still too young to remember more than fragments, i remember what happened, how he forced our younger sisters to evolve and change their very nature for his benefit."

I let my words sink in that thick skull of my sister before proceeding: "And yes, to a point i enjoyed his preference on me, but i never wanted you or the others to suffer and we left as soon as i knew, when i realize how much that life would have cost us"

I prepare my battle stance, and prepare a little trick for my stubborn sister, hopefully she will understand that not all human are the same, that you must face your past and put it to rest, or let it will torment you until the bitter end

Chrystal prepare herself to use the very move she used that day, when her broken hearth transformed my sweet, fun loving sister, in a creature that live only for vengeance

Christal: "I am not trapped in the past sister, it's your eyes that are blinded by your need, i will give this human exactly what he deserve.."

For the moment i stop considering the Glaceon in front of me as my sister, if i want my plan to succeed for us and her own good, i cannot fail

The whole room freeze as soon as the icy wind touch the walls, and with a quick glance towards Acqua and Flare, i notice their departure towards the human room, good a free field for me

My reflexes and combat experience permit me to elude Chrystal terrible wrath by removing myself from her chosen attack pattern as she remain focused on charging her winds, as soon as she stop charging her moves i strike

Moving my leaf in synchrony i prepare to hit Chrystal head on with a Quick Attack and then release it with a Giga Impact, at least our old master taught us something....

Chrystal turn to me, but it's too late as i push all my strength in the last move, she may have higher defense, but my attack is stronger then hers

Chrystal: "Ahhhhhhh!"

Boooooom


I stop, recovering from my quick succession of attacks, as i had hoped the impact slammed Chrystal on the wall, knocking her out

I am relieved to see her mostly intact, beside a bad bruise on her side just slightly above where her burn is, i suppose it's fate

I hear the human coming: "What's in tartarus it's going on there!?"

I look at chrystal and notice the quite visible ^crater^ she made when her body impacted the wall, ops, i don't think he will be happy about this.

113331111211111221212122111.content:
---Your Pov---


Given the sound of battle i heard coming from the living room, i quickly get up and run towards i fear is was left of my house. I don't even notice what the real status of the house is before screaming at the grass pokemon

"What's in tartarus it's going on there!?"

The scene greetings my not so heroic entrance is not as bad as i have originally thought, i expected to find half room demolished and a piece of the roof missing, i don't know why i expected anything to happen to the roof but..

Anyway, instead i find two walls practically frozen with the Leafeon standing over the Glaceon body, with a noticeable hole shaped just like the back of the downed ice type, fuck my walls!

"Leaf-..wait...Viria, yes you are named Viria right?"

The grass type calmly nod, i point at the hole in the wall along with the half frozen hallway "Why, this happened to my house? Why since the short period since i got to know your sister, this happen to my house?"

An afterthought rapidly insinuate in my head "And she is alive right?"

Viria nod once again, calmly answering my question as if nothing was wrong "I regret what happened to your house, but Chrystal left me no choice, she wished to harm you and the rest of my sister simply because we wanted to accept your offer, to become a real family"

I feel a little more calm now, watching my surroundings and noticing the poor little Eevee trembling while she try to hide her form behind the leg of a table, not sure if the lack of concern from the rest of the sister is the part that bother me, or the fact that every one of them seems very casual about the battle

Viria continue her speak, attracting back my attention "Do not worry about my other sisters, they all know about Chrystal problems with emotion and leave her to her own devices most of the time, as any attempt to helping her tend to end up with a fight, this is not the first time an attempt conclude in this way, and it probably won't be the last"

"This is ridiculous, i mean...what?

"I'll keep them all in line, and help you adjust to the changes and responsibility that now befall on you as alpha"

"....sorry?"

Viria and some of the other girls chuckle at my confusion "It's simple really, as the only male of our family, and obviously not sharing our blood, you have to take the responsibility that sharing your home with us imply"

I continue to look at her unsure, she walk closer to me and jump on my chest, i catch her by reflex "It mean you silly human, that from now on you will help me keeping order in our family, and ensure that any of us has everything we might require to live with you as comfortably as possible, by our standards of course, we certainly do not expect...hmm, how do you human..ha yes, the red carpet"

I put Viria down, as i reach for Eve and bring her to my chest, trying my best in calming her down, then seating in one of the couch without any pokemon on it

My attention has the desired effect, calming down the scared Eevee, making her purr softly "Can't we just be a normal family and all cooperate instead?"

Viria smile and jump on my legs, gently nuzzling the Eevee in my arms "Of course we will, but pokemon family always have someone coordinating the whole group, being the alpha or a more appropriate substitute if the need arise"

I sigh "And what is my role then?"

Viria chuckle once more "I told you, helping me coordinating our family, and mating with us of course, i would suggest beginning with the one of us that still hasn't been mated yet, to better improve our concept of sharing"

It's my turn to smile "An do i have to assume that you are among the candidate, miss Viria?"

The Leafeon gently push down her brown sister, and come even closer to me, purposely placing her hot, dripping sex on my crotch "Not one candidate my alpha, the next family member you are gonna mate, for better or for worse"

My confused expression prompt her to clarify "In a pokemon family there are no...how..ha yes, lazy bones, everyone has a role, or more then one that get exchanged between members, but the alpha role are not so easily exchanged, or at all. For better because no matter what, in a group where many females and few male are present, the male hold quite the ..leash..on us, being the only one that can satisfy our needs fully...but"

I gulp "I am also the only one and with you all in heat.."

She rub her sex on my crotch a little faster, harder "Yes, but do not expect much leeway after our season is passed, as one of us is bound to be horny more often then not, especially now that we have a stable mate to share our lust with"

Viria shorten the distance between her muzzle and my lips too fast for me to react and kiss me directly on the lips, her tongue easily gain access to my still partially open mouth and press the advantage by caressing my tongue with her smaller, but still quite strong one. A pleasant mint aftertaste remain on my palate even after she back down

She cease her rubbing "Normally i will be more forthcoming with answers, but my heat is rapidly becoming unbearable with you so close" she come even closer and whisper in my ear "Now that finally i have a human mate again"

She doesn't even allow me to reply and continue "Now my alpha" she begin to purr as the Eevee did before, but more intently, her eyes full of lust "ready to claim another member in your family?"

She sits and listens I start by telling them that… “You guys are destroying my house! If you’re going to live with me I would like it if the house was to stay intact.”

They all nod in agreement as I tell them to un-freeze the walls the flareon gets right on it and then afterwards goes back into line I then see what else there is to do… I see that the wall has and impact mark on it. I then think about what I can do about it… I decide to move to other things.

I don’t really see much else that we can check as I then realize I hadn’t mated Viria. I point to her and say “You come with me.” I turn to my Charizard and say “Make sure they don’t destroy anything else and keep an eye on Crystal.” And me and Viria head up the stair case.

As we then reach the top of the stair case I pick her up. As I carry her into my room I then look at her she is staring at me like she knows what’s coming next. As I ask if she is ready from this as some of them were just upon me and not even asking for my approval.

She then nods as I strip my body of my clothing she turns around and then lifts her tail as I soon take her as my own a few minutes later I launch my load into her womb and fall on the bed and rest before I hear a loud boom downstairs I quickly get dresses and then head down with Viria.

When I get down there I see my Charizard and Crystal fighting it looks like crystal has taken quite a lot of damage and still firing ice beams at quick reloads while my Charizard is just as quickly using flamethrower countering her ice beams she finally is slowing down while my Charizard is soon just moving left and right as it seems all the energy of Crystal is slowly waning out as she has used a lot of her energy just firing all them fast attacks.

As I run over and stop her as she slowly charges a large beam which I am guessing is a blizzard attack. I soon pick her up and ask if she is okay? She simply leans on me tired. 11411.content:
“Haahh, haahh” you pant as you trudge through the snow of northern Sinnoh. For about the hundredth time you see a Snover appear before you. You have been hiking for several hours and are thoroughly ticked off by the persistence of the local Pokémon.

“Monferno, Flame wheel” releasing the playful Pokémon you call out the command to use your go to move. Spewing flames from its mouth Monferno flips forward speeding towards the doomed grass and ice type.

The burning wheel easily plows through the Snover, immolating and crushing it into the ground.

“Good job” you praise your Pokémon before you return it to its ball. You take a moment and just stand for a moment. A slight movement at the edge of your vision draws your attention.

“Arceus Damn it” you turn to face the next Pokémon you’ll do battle with. Standing in the snow is a Sneasel, “Again with this bullshit” you pull out a pokeball and press the release only to have the sneasel snatch it out of your hand.

“Hey, give that back you lit-mph” the sneasel throws a snowball, hitting you in the face.

“You’re begging for this, GO SHIELDON!” you roar as you pitch one of your pokeballs only to have it ripped from your grasp as well.

“Sne sne sne” the offending dark type snickers at your frustration. At a loss, you make a snowball of your own and throw it at the sneasel. To your surprise you hit it dead on, the snow covering its face. Wiping the snow from its face the sharp claw Pokémon grins wickedly and places your pokeballs neatly on the ground, before gathering a large snowball together and throwing it at you. Despite being snow it is thrown with quite a bit of force and knocks you off balance as it hits.

In retaliation you throw a volley of your own snowballs, enjoying yourself despite the situation. The impromptu snowball fight escalates until the both of you are just plain laughing as you hurl chunks of snow at each other. Eventually one of the Sneasels projectiles causes you to overbalance and fall on your ass. Sneasel is on you in an instant, sitting on your lap gazing up at you with a smile. You gently pet its head as you catch your breath.

“So you’re a girl” you mumble absently as you run your finger down the short crest extending from her ear. Sneasel leans against you with a soft “Snea”. Your hand works its way over to her ears and rub them gently.

Sneasel mumbles happily as you scratch behind her ears. The silence is broken by your ringtone, loud obnoxious, and impossible to ignore. You slide it out of your pocket and answer.

“Hello?” “Where are you, you were supposed to be here half an hour ago” “Mom, relax I was on my way over and I got sidetracked. I’ll be there soon, love you, bye” you hang up with a sigh. “Sorry Sneasel, I’ve got to go”

“Sneaaa” she whines pitifully as you lift her off your lap. “I know, I want to play some more too” you get to your feet. “But my family’s having a reunion, and I haven’t seen some of them for years”

You give Sneasel one last pet on the head and pick up the pokeballs that she had taken before setting off towards the town. You had only taken a couple steps when a snowball hits you in the back of the head. “Hey, come on now” you turn to face her “I’ll be coming back down this way tomorrow, we can play more then” you kneel down in front of her and hold out your hand. “Promise?” she looked at you for a moment before placing her claw in your hand “Sneasel” “Great, I’ll see you tomorrow”

You hike back up trail towards your parents’ home, Sneasel disappearing into the distance.
11411.title: number 1

114111.content:
You shake the snow off your jacket as you step up onto the porch and ring the doorbell. After a moment it swings open spilling light out onto the front lawn. Framed by the light is a face you haven’t seen in years. Your mothers Mr. Mime, Mimesy. You cringe inwardly every time you think about it, your mother was terrible at nicknaming her Pokémon.

“Mime!” he greets, happily grabbing your arm and pulling you into the foyer. You slide out of your jacket and hang it on the coat rack, already laden with many others. The sound of laughter echoes from the dining room. You sigh and step into the room, not looking forward to being the focus of attention. As you move through the doorway all eyes immediately focus on you. You take a quick look around and offer a quick greeting.

“H-hey everybody”

It’s quiet for a moment, before one of your younger cousins runs over and hugs your leg calling out your name to the best of his ability.

“EWIC!” You lean down and hug the little tyke, and everyone else begins to greet you all at once. You mingle for a little while, talking to your relatives. After about an hour the older members of the group head to the kitchen and start making drinks, leaving the children to play amongst themselves.

Your uncle passes you a beer with a wink, as you were still a few months away from being legal. You twist off the cap and clink your bottles together, before taking a long swig. The bitter taste took some getting used to but you didn’t dislike it.

The night continues on and after a while people begin to release their Pokémon to join in. You follow suit allowing Monferno and Shieldon to have some fun as well. With everyone having multiple Pokémon, the open space in the rooms quickly disappeared. Several hours pass in a slight haze from the alcohol. Your uncle, now thoroughly drunk, slouched on your shoulder.

“W-where’s –hic- Jason? I wanna hear the, the story bout, urrp that uh Abomasnow”

You slowly sit him down in a chair assuring him that you’ll find Jason. You see no sign of Jason and conclude he must be outside smoking. You don’t find him on the porch out front or out back so you keep looking. You keep looking through the house until you find yourself upstairs, a sound from the guest room draws your attention.

“Hey Jason, you in here?” you open the door to find a very surprised Jason and his Lopunny.
You stand silently for a moment as you struggle to comprehend what you are seeing. Jason is not wearing pants, his Lopunny is kneeling in front of him, the Lopunny has his dick in her mouth.

Confident you understand what is transpiring, you turn and walk away silently. You shut the door behind you and head back downstairs. A few minutes later Jason, now with pants, comes down as well.

“We need to talk” he sits next to you in the corner where you had sat to try to forget what you had seen
114111.title: The reunion

1141111.content:
"I don't want to talk to you," you tell him flatly, "What you were doing is disturbed and wrong,"

"You don't understand," he sighs and pinches the bridge of his nose. "Look just hear me out. Please?"

With a clenched jaw you stalk out onto the porch and lean over the railing.

"You wanna talk? Fine, talk,"

"Alright," he joins you leaning over the edge, "First, I'm not forcing her to do anything," he reassures you, "We've been physical with each other for a couple of years, ever since she evolved. She actually came on to me first. My reaction was pretty similar to yours at first," her laced his fingers together as he talked and rested his chin against them. "I tried to find her another Pokémon, but it didn't turn out well. She actually tried to hurt one,"

He stops to pull out a cigarette and light up, "I stopped trying to find a good match after that. A few days passed, and I woke up one night, I was well, I was inside her," he took a long drag after saying that, "I was pissed, but I couldn't deny how good it felt. Much better than any girl I'd been with. I decided to just finish and deal with it later,"

You shuffle a bit, uncomfortable with the story you're listening to.

"Afterwards, she curled up and started crying. I had no idea what to do, so I just hugged and comforted her. I was mad sure but she was still my best friend. After she calmed down she typed out an apology on my tablet, saying she just couldn't take it any longer and how much she loved me," he pauses and looks up into the sky "It wasn't long before I realized I loved her too. She was always there by my side and had been for years, supporting me no matter what. She legitimately loves me and I love her back,"

"There has to be some kind of law against this right?" You question

"Nope, it's perfectly legal,"

"But she's not human,"

"So what?" you keep trying to find reasons as to why what he's doing is wrong but as you go back and forth you slowly realize your argument doesn't have a leg to stand on.

"Alright I give up, I can't think of any reason it's wrong, but I still don't like it," it's really starting to get late now, and you've had a long day. "I won't tell anyone, but you'd better be more careful in the future. I'm going to sleep,"

As you turn to go inside he grabs your shoulder, "Hey, thanks for hearing me out,"

After a moment you reply, "Yeah, no problem," and pull open the sliding door. You navigate your way through the dark house to the guest room you're using.

As you crawl under the covers you can't help but think about the conversation you just had. You didn't have any real reasons for it, but you still had a nagging doubt,"

"Whatever, I'll never get any sleep if I keep thinking about it," you roll onto your side and close your eyes.

You open your eyes and look around the room for a moment before you focus on the dark figure next to you. It was about three feet tall with a pink crest and a gold gem on its forehead. 1142221111.content:
You slowly sit up, feeling your muscles cramp. "Weav!" the dark type crouched next to you and pushed on your shoulders, trying to keep you down. You lay back against the wall of the cave.

"Did you save me?" she responds with a nod feeling your forehead for a fever. Satisfied that you weren't sick, she scampered off into the shadows, and returned with berries. Taking a Sitrus berry from the group, she diced it into small pieces, and offered them to you.

"Thanks" you take the pieces of fruit and devour them quickly. "Damn, I was hungry. How long was I out?" Weavile pointed to a crude scratching of what appeared to be the sun followed by three marks. "Three days? I've been asleep for three days?!" you start to panic a little knowing your family was probably worried sick.

You try to stand, but you're still too weak and fall back down. "Weavile" she admonished, waving a claw disaprovingly. "But I have to get home!" you grumble quietly, massaging feeling back into your legs.

"Weavile! Wea!" with an air of finality she pointed to the spot you were sitting in, as if to say don't move.

She dissolved back into the shadows, this time returning with a blanket. She throws it over you making sure you were comfortable, before she lays next to you and falls asleep.

The blanket is soft from years of use and smells faintly earthy. Despite the situation you find that you quickly become drowsy, and welcome sleeps embrace.

Your eyes open to a great expanse of white. You slowly turn to both sides and realize that it's the sky, and you're laying prone on a snowy bluff. You can tell that it's cold but you can't feel the chill. "A dream?" you mumble out loud "Maybe?"

You rise to your feet and approach the edge of the cliff. It was a sheer drop with no end in sight, finding that it's the same all the way around you decide to just wait for something to happen. You wait for what seems like hours before you get lonely. "I wish Weavile were here, then it wouldn't be so bad" A tap on your shoulder snaps you out of your thoughts and has you on your feet. "Okay definitely a dream" You relax and sit back down, where you are joined by your companion. She leans against you and snuggles up extremely close. You feel her heartbeat and marvel at the details in this dream, it was more lifelike than anything else you could imagine.

Weavile gently lowers you back to the ground and pets your head reassuringly. "Wea Weavile" she coo's softly, blowing her cool breath across your ear. You clench your fists and close your eyes as the heat spikes. Your teeth grind together as you snarl in pain.

1153321121.content:
"Ung... uggghh... urr..." you began to wake up with an aching groan. Man, were you hurting. The sleep was not pleasant nor was it relaxing. You dont recall having any good dreams until now. In fact, you dont even remember how you fell asleep in the first place. At the moment, everything before now was an awful blur. Were you drunk? Drugged? Knocked out? Lost a pokemon battle and experienced what was called a 'white out'?

You dont even recall falling asleep in the middle of a huge bed of sunflowers in a wide-open field. What were you doing sleeping outside to begin with?

"Hm?!" .....You ALSO dont recall your arms and legs being tied together in ropes!! Ok, who was the jerk that's pulling this little prank on you?! No matter how much you struggle, you cant break free of the ropes! To make matters worse, you dont see anybody else with you in this flower field. Youre all alone...
"HELLO?!!" you call out, hoping someone out there can here you, "ANYBODY THERE?!! HELLO??!"
No response. "SOMEBODY? ANYBODY!! HELP!! I'M TIED UP IN THE MIDDLE OF A SUNFLOWER GARDEN AND I CANT MOVE!!!"

Still no response. "HEEELLLPP!!! PLEASE HELP!!!!" Nothing. Youre on your own. Wonderful. You'd try to wobble out of there, but your body's aching and the lack of much blood circulating to your arms and legs dont help it much either. You'll be exhausted and in extreme pain before you reach the end of the field!
Looks like youre stuck there. You could be stuck there for hours... even days! Will you ever see your friends and family again? Are you even anywhere near home anymore? ...and who... who would do this to you?! AND WHY?!

"Gar? Garde?" just then, you heard someone's voice. It sounded rather cute and feminine, but now wasnt the time to reflect on how a girl's voice sounded!
"Hello?" you try and call back to the voice, "Im over here. Can you hear me?"
"Gar garde. Gar." That didnt sound like any language you recognize. Nonetheless, the voice was coming from right behind you. You turned around to see someone looking down at you. Or rather someTHING.

Standing before you is a slightly tall green-haired creature with long green arms, blood-red eyes, pale white skin wearing what seems to be a billowing dress of the exact same color and two pink half-valentine-like outgrowths sticking out in the middle of it's chest.
This creature is a pokemon. But not just any pokemon. It's a Gardevoir! And quite a cute and lovely one, too. But lovely or not, you dare not underestimate a high-leveled pokemon! You wouldnt want to agitate her and have her use those psychic powers against you! And seeing as though you dont see a trainer nearby, she must be a wild pokemon. Not a good sign, since wild pokemon are incredibly unpredictable. You dare not imagine what kinds of damage a high-leveled unpredictable wild Gardevoir can do to your brain out of fear she might read your thoughts and get nasty ideas!

"Gardevoir!" but she wasnt showing any signs of hostility. She looked back at you with those intriguing red eyes and smiles. She even grabbed the folds of her 'dress' and curtsied to you. Cute. But once again, powerful!
"Uh... hi!" you greeted her, "um, listen I could use your help here. Can you um... untie me, please?"
"Gard?" she just tilted her head as she smiled. Maybe she cant understand what youre saying. But being a psychic, couldnt she just listen to the voice in your mind? Or maybe she just doesnt understand English.

"Please G-uh, Ms. Gardevoir!" you continue to plead as Gardevoir edged just a little closer to you, "I c-cant break free. Please untie me!"
"Ga ha ha ha arde!" you couldve sworn that was a giggle coming out of her mouth! The way she bent down at you and grinned, you could swear she's playing around with you!

Nonetheless, you dont want to do anything stupid. "Please! Im serious! Untie me, please!"
"Gaaaarrrrdeee?"
"Ms. Gardevoir! Please untie m-!!!!" You cut yourself off the moment she lowered her head just an inch or so away from your face! Judging by the way youre blushing, youre not used to a pretty face being THAT close to yours! Hmm. This Gardevoir's been acting a little suspicious. It's almost as if your little 'capture' was planned out or something!!

Finally, after what seemed like an hour of staring into her eyes, Gardevoir-
1153321121.title: 'I'm here to rescue you! ...Yeah... rescue...'

11533211212.content: she leans in slightly parting her lips and she begins to kiss you! you're surprised at this, but is this just a normal kiss?

115332112122.content: this kiss... it doesn't feel normal. you try to lean back to get out of it, but just end up falling onto your back. the gardevoir giggles at you and lays over top of you to continue the kiss, by now you know that this isn't a kiss, it's a pokemon move! what move is it?

1153321121221.content:
Your lips instinctively start to twitch as the Gardevoir kisses them. Your eyes even blink uncontrollably. As soon as she finally stops kissing you, your eyes go from blinking uncontrollably to being hard to focus. You feel dizzy for a couple seconds, then you feel tired. You recall watching a documentary on Jinx's before that described a move of theirs which involved these symptoms. The Gardevoir had just used Lovely Kiss on you! A Gardevoir using a Jinx's signature move?! How is that possible?!

It didnt matter at the moment. You were in no state of mind to question it. You were too busy struggling to keep yourself awake. Sadly it was far easier said than done. Gardevoir's a high-leveled pokemon. And an attack like that could knock out a beast ten times your size.
By the time you realized the tenacity of this sleep attack, you had already took your mind completely off the discomfort of the ropes. However, that was the only good thing about it. The rest of your body had already went limp and your head was soon to join it. Even as you struggled to keep your eyelids open, your consciousness was already slipping into dream mode!

Noticing this, Gardevoir smiled and gently lifted herself off of you. She stood up straight and looked down at you... then her eyes glowed and the next thing you noticed was you were staring at her at the same height level! Feeling nothing beneath you, you assumed she had lifted you off the ground with her telepathy! With that playful smile never leaving her face, she turned around and trotted off... as your body was floating along with her against your will!
"Where are you.... ta.....zzzzz...." you didnt get to finish asking her before you quickly slipped to sleep.

...............

"Urggh....gyaaad...." it ached waking up. It ached BADLY. It wasnt just your wrists and legs hurting, it was your whole body, including your head. If you were drugged earlier, THIS must be what a drug withdrawal feels like! You dont know how long you've out been because the alarm clock nearby was broken. Despite the throbbing pain, you forced yourself to get up and you quickly find yourself lying on a bed in an unfamiliar bedroom. It looked like a teenage girl's bedroom what with the worn out boy band posters and pictures of girly cartoon characters on the wall. You notice the room was a slight mess with several shirts, pants, and dresses torn off the hangars in the closets and piled all over the floor. Someone wasnt very tidy.

Nonetheless, you rub your pounding head and gradually get out of the bed and leave the room. You wobbled a bit walking down the hall, admiring the unfamiliar house you were currently in.
"Hello?" you called out, "anybody here?" You hear no response. You peeked into another bedroom (you assume was the parents' room), but found nobody inside. Nobody but dust and a few cobwebs. Guess 'tidiness' runs in the family.

"Hello?" you continue calling out as you head toward the living room. Didnt take you long to discover you were in a log cabin in the middle of the woods. What woods? Who's log cabin? You still havent figured that out yet. But somebody's here. The tv's on (flashing a test pattern), a door's wide open, window's smashed, and there's a pile of clothes and left over food on the couch.

"GARDEVOIR!!"

You almost jumped out of your skin as soon as you heard that familiar voice shout out of nowhere! You turned around and almost tripped over from being so unprepared for her as you faced that Gardevoir from before. Your eyes widened... then quickly squinted from disbelief. You had the oddest look on your face as you stared at this Gardevoir now wearing a cute pink T-shirt that looked a little too big for her and a pair of blue jeans barely hanging over hips because she hasnt seemed to mastered zipping them up properly. You were still trying to comprehend why she put sparkly glitter in her green hair... but it was silly enough she smeared quite a bit too much lipstick on her lips. Was she trying to look like people? Cute. Weird, but cute.

"Gar de Voiiirr!!" she happily sang and twirled as left glitter on the floor!
Despite making for one hell of a strange day, you tried to keep calm (Gardevoir was still a pretty powerful psychic pokemon after all).

"Uh... is this your house?" you asked her.
"Gar gar de," she spoke gleefully and you couldnt understand her.
"Are you this family's pokemon?" you kept questioning, hoping you'll get something from her.
"Gar de voiiir!" she twirled again, again leaving glitter everywhere.
"This cabin," you try again, "the people that own it. Where are they?"
"Gar de v-ah," Gardevoir looked down and tried to adjust her borrowed jeans and frowned, "gaaar. De gar! Voir de gard?" she asked with a pouty look on her face.
This wasnt helping. You scratched your head trying to think. An idea comes to mind. Since Gardevoir's specialize in telepathy, maybe you can communicate with her telepathically?

'Where are the people that own this cabin?' you ask her through thought.
"Gaaaarr... de!" she didnt notice it. She was too busy trying to adjust her tight jeans.
'Where are the people that own this cabin?' you think again. Gardevoir was too busy adjust her T-shirt as well to take notice.
"Gardevoir?" you say out loud.
"Gardevoir?" you finally get her attention. So you try it again.
You stare her straight in the eye and repeat the thought, 'Where are the people that own this cabin?'
Gardevoir tilts her head questionably. Is she not getting you message? Is it not working? Or are you not trying hard.

You give this one last shot before giving up and trying to figure things out on your own.
You stare intently at the Gardevoir, focus on clearing your head and concentrate hard like youre trying to send mental-waves to her. Feeling like you concentrated hard enough, the voice in your heads as loud as possibly, hoping that her own mind will pick it up. 'WHERE. ARE. THE. PEOPLE. THAT. OWN. THIS. CABIN?'

As soon as the question ended, Gardevoir smiled again. Then you coulda sworn you heard a faint voice call out to you. Did she reply to you? It seemed like that to you, because the voice sounded like...
1153321121221.title: Cabin Fever

1153321122.content:
Your name is Kyle, you're 16-years-old and you're currently a Pokemon trainer on a journey to become Champion in the Hoenn region. At this moment, you've received two badges and are moving onto the third as you head towards Mauville city to face Wattson.

You've captured many Pokemon, but the closest companion is your female Gardevoir, Nissi who has been with you since you were little. Your parents raised you and Nissi when she was just a little ralts and overtime, you and Nissi became the closest of friends. To you, she's almost like a sister.

As such, Nissi is traveling alongside you and almost never goes into a pokeball as she prefers to stay next to you. Although you like to think of her as someone of the same age, Nissi actually likes to think herself as the "older sister", to your annoyance. In some ways, she's always been trying to take care of you and when she evolved into a Gardevoir when you were only 14-years-old, she had both the height advantage and stature to be the "older sister". You thought of it as unfair.

Even to this day, she's taller than you, if not by a little. You're standing at 5'9" while she's about 5'10". While traveling and seeing other Gardevoirs, you found something else about Nissi you never realized. Biologically speaking, she's somehow a little taller than most Gardevoirs but above all else, you've come to find that her chest is not normal.

Yes, Nissi actually has breasts around the C-cup size. Of course, you've never really noticed them when you were little and growing up as you thought they were normal, but now after comparing to what most Gardevoirs look like, you realize she's supposed to have a flat chest with her heart-shaped tag in between.

'It looks like I'm something real special, huh master?' she would claim proudly when you and her both realized the difference.

It is what it is, but now that you're older, you've begun to realize how beautiful Gardevoirs are and it might be due to the fact that they are some of the most humanoid Pokemon to walk the Earth. With Nissi's...interesting chest, joyful and optimistic smile, and her tendency to remain close to you, it's becoming harder to see her as someone like family.

'Master! You're staring off into space again!'

You gasp as you hear Nissi telepathically alert you. Feeling embarrassed, you chuckle nervously.

"Uh, sorry about that," you apologize as you and her walked the route to Mauville city.

Nissi narrows her eyes suspiciously at you. 'Sometimes, it's really tempting to just peak into your mind, master.'

"Please don't," you flatly reject.

Nissi grins.

'Well...who knows, maybe I already have~. You wouldn't know it in the first place,' she warns.

"Well, sorry to say, but there's nothing interesting in my head," you claim.

'That's not true~ I've been living with you since we were both little, you're the most...'

She pauses and hums flatly in your mind.

'...actually, you might be pretty boring, master,' she corrects herself as she thinks to the past.

You feel a little annoyed, but this is just how she is. At the same time, although you wouldn't admit it, you wouldn't have it any other way.

Nissi giggles again and leans close to you, locking her arm with you and humming contently. While this is normal as she's always stuck close to you, for the past few weeks since you've started this journey, you've become highly aware of Nissi's tendency to remain close and her blatant affection. Gardevoirs are always affectionate to their trainers, willing to risk their lives for their master's safety, but you know that it's not something you should react to.

You internally groan, wondering why you chest has been feeling heavy recently.

What happens next?
1153321122.title: Kyle and the Gardevoir, Nissi

11533221.title: OH! No not the bees! NOT THE BEES! AAAAAAGGGHHHHHH

115332211.content:
You dont have to be ashamed of it. We all have our personal fears that can truly scare us to death. It's understandable that yours is bees. I mean who could blame ya? The damn things are HUGE! Heck the beedrills are a little over half your size and have gigantic stingers for hands! Arceus help you if you actually trip and fall right in the middle of a beedrill nest!

Anyways, long story short, you have a terrible fear of bees. Something about a childhood trauma, but everytime you ever walk into a forest, you always ALWAYS carry insect repellant and listen hard for buzzing. You'd never go near your best friend's beedrill no matter how friendly and playful it gets with you. Sure these bugs tend to keep their distance if you keep your distance and are a necessity due to the honey they produce, but still!

This became a detriment seeing as though one hot blistering summer, your parents had to leave on a business trip far away in the Unova region for a few days. You had the house all to yourself. With a bit of money and food to tide you over, it was gonna be a nice pleasant few days...

...AT LEAST until you turned on the tv to watch Operation RePokemon when it got rudely interrupted thanks to a special news report!
Several rogue swarms of Combees have flown in all the way from Sinnoh and started migrating down south. Colonies had been spotted in small corners of Kanto and a few towns in Hoenn. The SS Anne in Vermillion City had to be fumigated and closed off due to a big wild nest making itself at home within the luxurious ship.
"Aw, you cant be serious," you groaned as your fears began to escalate.
"Combees are known to be gentle and affectionate to humans," the news reporter stated, "however, they can be hostile and aggressive during migration. This is usually the sign that a new Vespiquen has been crowned and are ready to expand their territory. When this happens, Combees scout out in search of food, nesting ground, and a potential mate for the newly crowned Vespiquen. If you see any nearby, it is recommended that you remain indoors until the migrating is finished."

You shrugged and turned off the tv, trying to calm the panic that's dying to tear out of your body. You remember the breathing exercises your doctor told you to do when a panic attack's about to start and successfully put the fire before it could spread.
"Whew... ....'potential mate'?" you squinted your eyes thinking about what the news reporter said, but you tossed that thought aside.

“Theyre just extremely rare cases,” you tell yourself, “what are the odds that any of would swarm anywhere near here?” You convinced yourself you had nothing to worry about. After dinner, you still thought about that news report, but even before you thought ‘What if-’, you kept on telling yourself you had nothing to worry about throughout the night just before heading off to sleep. What were the odds, indeed.

*****************************

"Beeee.... beee.... bee....."

Your pleasant sleeping gets cut short thanks to the sound of strange buzzing. The strong scent of honey filled the air. If you any other person, you'd just shrug it off and go back to sleep. But because youre the great big Beeophobe, you immediately open your eyes, and nearly jump out of bed wondering where you kept that bug spray. You overheard the buzzing coming from outside your bedroom window. You sensed very very VERY bad things coming from that direction, but you still approached the window. Something deep down was telling you 'DONT OPEN THE CURTAIN DONT OPEN THE CURTAIN DONT OPEN THE CURTAIN', but like 90% of the murder victims in horror movies, you go against common sense and open the damn curtain!

"COMBEEE!!! COMB BEE! BEEE!! COMB!!! COMBEE!"

"EyyyaaAAAAHHH!!!" you fell back screaming at the huge wall of cute smiley-faced honey combs stacked right outside your window! Each one of them smiling into your soul. Combees! While they looked like friendly smiles on their cute little faces, you imagined hearing them say 'We HaVe BeEn WaItInG fOr YoU, JeRrY wEsTwAnE!!'

You heard each of the Combees mutter to one another in their pokemon language as you stayed perfectly still, trying to keep absolute quiet, and trying not to show any more fear than you already were showing.
"They cant get in here," you whispered to yourself and ignored the sweat dripping off you, "they cant get in. They cant ge-"

"ComBEEE!!!"
*Twwwiiiiinnnnnngggg*
*CRAAAACCKKK!!*
Oh right. Bug Buzz.

The combees let out an echoing noise that was so high-pitched, it shattered the glass!! With their way in secured, flying three-headed smiling combees swarmed in by the dozen!

"Gyaaaddd!!!" you screamed as you darted out of your room, slamming the door shut behind you! You could still the playful cries of 'Combee! COMBEE!! COMBEE!!' coming from all directions! They surrounded the house!
*Twiiiingg*
*Crack! CRACK!! CRAAACCKK!!*
Windows in your kitchen and living room shattered as more of those combees flooded in! You could hear the combees mumbling inside your parents' room, so you dare not open the door. Sadly, you remember last minute that you left your can of bug spray in the garage... which was already occupied by a Combee wall! The only safe place in the house was the bathroom, but only because there were bars over the window. You dashed in to the bathroom, locked the door (as if combees could turn knobs!) and prayed.

"I dont understand it," you whisper to yourself, "why the hell would they coming HERE of all places?! It's not like we have a garden. We aint got much food a combee would eat and theyre aint a decent pollinating field for miles!" You seriously wondered deeply about it. Why would they come HERE?

"COMB BEEE!!"
"COOOOMB!!!"

Just then, you heard combees just outside the door. They were actually waiting outside. For what?! You?!

*Bump! BUMP!* They were ramming the door! You were completely perplexed by this!
"Combee!!!" shouted the combee outside your window! One of the heads was shouting impatiently while the other two heads were biting down on the bars trying in vain to yank them off! You couldnt believe that your worst nightmare was coming to fruition! The bees were coming after you! YOU, personally! What did you do to deserve this misery?! You always kept your distance! You dont even like honey!

"What?!" you shouted at the combee, "what do you want?!"

"Com....bee...." the third head answered. You squinted your eye as you partially translated that single word, "....Queen? What's this about a queen?"

Your eyes narrowed and your skin paled when you the notice the wood in the door was starting to crack!
It was very short before the last bit of wood keeping the lock in place was cracked out of the place, causing the door to swing open... and the legion to descend upon you!

Dozens of combee heads stared at you smiling as they flew toward you, ready to swarm...
115332211.title: Rise of the Swarm
